channel.description: Recent content in RPG on Game Rift

item.title: Voyages of Nera
item.description: Game Description Voyages of Nera offers gamers the role of Echo, a descendant of the long -disappeared defenders of the world. The main task is to cross the magical ocean to confront monstrous creatures and the awakening of scattered spirits. This world, negligently, is filled with ancient ruins and original biomes located on its islands. Players can combine up to 10 people for joint swimming around the seas or go on a trip alone.

item.title: Restart Shuhan Dynasty: Origin
item.description: Game Description In Restart Shuhan Dynasty: Origin, a modern worker is transferred to the East Han dynasty torn by conflicts. At first, he has a handicap, believing that knowledge of future events will provide him with the right path to victory. Soon the hero discovers how the story begins to deviate from known facts, because his actions create waves in time. The player is trying on the role of Liu Bay, traveling around the world with familiar faces and inevitable elections, destroying the previous ideas about the era of three -prisoners.

item.title: Misty Judgment
item.description: Game Description Misty Judgment begins with the awakening of the protagonist, qi and, from a nightmare in a strange reality without clear memories. Unable to confirm his own personality, he investigates a series of murders filed in the video format with real actors. The main task is the search and analysis of evidence, the comparison of facts and the calculation of the criminal. Any solution affects further events, and the future of the protagonist depends on the deductive abilities of the player.

item.title: Shape of Dreams
item.description: Game Description Shape of Dreams project, whose essence is this: Imagine the action of Rogue-Lite, seasoned with Moba elements, invented by Lizard Smoothie for PC Gamers. Are you intrigued? Still. This world of dreams is your playground. You are sculpting the heroes from their memories, turning them into champions, like a sculptor from a cutter. Alone or with three friends in a cooperative, Adventure destroys the boundaries of the genre, offering something fresh.

item.title: Wandness: Wandcraft Survivor
item.description: Game Description Wandness: Wandcraft Survivor will put in the center of the process the creation of magic guns for survival in collisions with superior forces. The player’s main task is to go down as a procedurally generated dungeons for battles with hordes of monsters. The main tool for survival is a unique rod collected from the found magical components. This craft mechanics allows you to construct unique spells that change the behavior of shells used in battle.

item.title: Star Fire: Eternal Cycle
item.description: Game Description Star Fire: Eternal Cycle triggers a race in which the main character makes jerks and combo against alien enemies in futuristic 2.5D-gallocations. The gameplay is built on a combination of sid-scrolling battles in the spirit of Beat ‘Em Up and progression systems characteristic of Roguelite. Each attempt to clean the level is distinguished by a unique arrangement of enemies and procedurally generated branches of tracks. The player’s movement and attacks are designed for direct control, requiring evasions and accurate calculation of the time to win the cyberpanic opponents in the destroyed environment.

item.title: Adventure of Samsara
item.description: Game Description Adventure of Samsara begins with the resurrection of a solar champion, a long -dead Plutonian, revived by a primitive light source. This creature is instructed to re -activate the inter -spatial fortress to restore balance in the entire multi -senior. The main narrative explores the topics of death, revival and fragmented memory, while the protagonist moves through the deeply connected world. The disclosure of the deeper layers of the space storyline is a key component of advancement, requiring players to overcome the obstacles of the environment to fulfill their goal.

item.title: Overlooting
item.description: Game Description Overlooting combines the alliance of three characters against the decaying dark power. The group includes Maximilian, a hero from a noble family, Liz, a thief wanted in many countries, and a shadow is a mysterious creature that was previously considered a source of damage. Their main task is the extraction of equipment controlled through the system of inventory within the framework of the crog. Such a structure guarantees that each attempt to complete the mission sets different conditions before the detachment, changing the path to victory in every new game.

item.title: Lost Soul Aside
item.description: Game Description Lost Soul Aside is a role -playing action inspired by Ninja Gaiden and Final Fantasy XV. The game has a worked out combat mechanics and provides an opportunity to explore a huge open world inhabited by various phantasmagoric creatures. The visual style is inspired by the “final box” and all lovers of modern JRPG-games will appeal. The game is based on a complex combat system, a characteristic series about deadly ninjo.

item.title: Quartet
item.description: Game Description Quartet immerses in the world in which incredible adventures and unforgettable battles await you. Start your way in the world of full mysteries, hidden government intrigues and powerful magic. In this fascinating and old -school RPG you can choose one of the four stories and go through them in any order, revealing the secrets of the Quartet world. A series of train robberies, a mysterious deck of cards, deadly aircraft and an accidental magician - all this awaits you in Quartet.

item.title: Beyond the Map
item.description: Game Description Beyond The Map begins with a shipwreck on the outskirts of the known seas, setting the player an immediate task of survival in a mysterious territory. The development of the character is complete without a class system: increasing the level of skills opens up new basic abilities. The search for rare folios with spells around the world provides access to incredible forces, additionally determining the capabilities of the hero.

item.title: Dice Gambit
item.description: Game Description Step -by -step battles in Dice Gambit allow us to plunge into tactical competitions, where the victory determines the cubes that affect the management of the characters. The game is designed for strategic miscalculations where a variety and excitement makes a bone throw. Each result on dits permits to obtain a limited number of actions for heroes fighting on combat arenas. The characters will be able to move, perform interactions with the environment or inflict damage to the opponents on the field.

item.title: Artis impact
item.description: Game Description Artis Impact throws the player under the control of Akan, a person traveling around the future world, populated people and artificial intelligence. The action takes place in the post-apocalyptic universe, the heroine being studied along with its AI-Companion Boat. The gameplay is built on step -by -step battles and the completion of side tasks from local inhabitants. The narrative presented through the pixel graphics and the style of comics combines humor with gloomy topics that open as it passes.

item.title: Ritual of Raven
item.description: Game Description Ritual of Raven is a narrative simulator with indirect magical farming. Arriving in the new world through an unstable portal, the player becomes a student of the witch Seij. The main task is to conduct rituals to stabilize portals threatening the village. Together with a familiar named Rayven, it is necessary to look for the missing satellite Seij, moving in the plot and collecting knowledge and components for his craft.

item.title: Liese in the City of Trials
item.description: Game Description Liese in the City of Trita puts the heroine Liz in the face of a new demonic threat years after the establishment of peace. In the former possessions of the defeated lord of demons, a fortress arises, flooding the city of weight in monsters. Liz arrives in a besieged metropolis to investigate the distress source. Local residents are facing inevitable danger, and it should act until the weight fell under the onslaught of the forces of darkness.

item.title: Frosthaven
item.description: Game Description Frosthaven is a digital adaptation of a board game that puts players at the head of a detachment of mercenaries in the northern settlement. This tactical role strategy uses step -by -step battles on a hexagonal map. You can go through the campaign missions alone or in an online cooperative with three other gamers. The action is unfolding on a border known by harsh conditions and dangerous inhabitants, constantly challenging the survival of the group.

item.title: PowerLust
item.description: Game Description Powerlust throws you into the open world, where you yourself form your fate. Create a unique character not connected by strict class restrictions. Become a magician of fire, owning a colossal sword, or an archer-nonsense, shedding death from afar. A huge selection of spells, weapons, abilities and skills will allow you to create your own game style and experiment with countless builds. But raw power is not all. A fight based on skills requires an exact choice of time and awareness.

item.title: Prospector
item.description: Game Description Prospector begins with arrival at someone else’s world, having only a set of tools at its disposal. The primary task is to collect the planet’s resources for the construction of the basis for the base. Players build structures, explore the environment, and then establish automated production lines. For construction, everything is used, from primitive materials to unknown alien substances found on the landscape. Gradually, a simple avantopost turns into a complex object with an optimized working process.

item.title: For Evelyn 2 - Shards of Creation
item.description: Game Description For Evelyn 2 - Shards of Creation puts a player in the world of auras, a kingdom encountered with war and dark magic. Months after the events of the previous part, the order of observers is the last defense of the region. Being a new member of this order, your decisions directly affect the outcome of the ongoing conflict. Each action forms the future of the entire kingdom, determining whether bloodshed or darkness will absorb these lands.

item.title: The Shaman's Ark
item.description: Game Description The Shaman’s Ark represents a world standing over an essence named the abyss. Once upon a time, people found a refuge on a structure called an ark, but the emptiness below now seeps back into their land. The shaman returns from darkness, armed only with a drum. The ancient melodies of the instrument function as a weapon, turning every battle with the ideas of the abyss into a rhythmic ritual committed on the verge of mortality.

item.title: Inkborn
item.description: Game Description Inkborn represents a card combat system based on the consistent use of glyphs for a tactical effect. Gamers have cards according to special symbols, activating chain results during step -by -step clashes with otherworldly creatures. Such a gameplay is the basis for promotion. The scene is a world created from ink, folded paper and metal containing a hidden story for disclosure. The narrative unfolds as the expeditions are completed and the tasks set.

item.title: Slayer: The Demon Haunted World
item.description: Game Description Slayer: The Demon Haunted World represents the world emerging from the period, which historians called the Aera of ash and dust. The belief in the end of this era was erroneous, because the shadows awaken again. A girl born under the moon and possessing white hair is the only one who can fight back the threat of fallen stars. She enters the tower for a battle with this evil, while the Universe balances on the verge of darkness.

item.title: Look mum no computer
item.description: Game Description Look Mum No Computer is a twin-style shooter, the action of which takes place in the Saldersworth universe. Players take on the role of Sam, working together with the cosmo-cosmo companion to combat mechanisms that have gone under control. The mission requires penetrating these devices to repair them and direct confrontation of chaos. The journey includes the execution of quests from the inhabitants of the machine worlds and a fight with large -scale bosses.

item.title: Dinosaurs Dominion
item.description: Game Description Dinosaurs Dominion is a single -user adventure focused on territorial conquest. The player has to control the dinosaur for battles, evolution and gradual seizure of control over the environment. Progress in each passage is earned through the study of the world and victory in battle. The defeat returns the creature by the beginning of his journey, which is a key feature of Roguelite design. The choice of 14 accessible species, from agile scouts to massive predators, provides different approaches to this survival cycle.

item.title: Undermine 2
item.description: Game Description Undermine 2 expands the Action-Roguelike formula, sending the players back to their underground world. Two conflicts are simultaneously unfolding within the limits of Developer: King Faraam IV is trying to return his kingdom, and the invisible war between demonic creatures permeates the very reality. The path begins with the role of a peasant, who has to move around this world, where human political squabbles serve as a distraction from deeper cosmic intrigues.

item.title: Grimshire
item.description: Game Description Grimshire represents a script with a spreading plague that threatens an isolated mountain settlement. The player arrives here after the absorption of his hometown with chaos, getting a chance for a new beginning on the local farm. Its role consists in managing the economy, collecting forest gifts and ensuring a permanent reserve in the cellar. The main task is to prevent bloating of food in preparation for the arrival of the disease, which requires competent supplies to maintain everyone’s life.

item.title: Craggenrock
item.description: Game Description Craggenrock puts a player in the role of Arlo, a blacksmith returning to the island of Khalin. In the restored settlement, Pareho Arlo opens the workshop to create equipment with adventurers and local residents. The task is to earn reputation and condition at the work of the forge. It is necessary to control the shop, make objects and participate in the local economy. This lesson forms the basis of a gameplay concentrated on management and production as part of this simulation.

item.title: The Demons Told Me to Make This Game
item.description: Game Description The Demons Told Me to Make This Game begins in the city of Red Havyvs at 5:00 a.m. on October 26, 2016. This moment marks the beginning of the last day of the world: the bloody ritual ends and a spirit named a dark light appears in the void. Being this incorporeal essence, the player cannot directly interact with the physical world. The main way of influence is the instilling in the inhabitants of the city and whipping them in the ear of instructions for sending their actions.

item.title: The King Is Watching
item.description: Game Description The King Is Watching is a unique combination of strategy, Roguelike and controls. In this Title, users take on the role of the ruler, whose presence affects the productivity of the kingdom. The central mechanics revolves around the strength of the gamer’s gaze, which dictates the effectiveness of various tasks, including resources, military training and much more. At any moment in time, the ruler must choose what to focus on, balancing between agriculture, mining and protection from external threats.

item.title: He is coming
item.description: Game Description He is coming is a world where forgotten evil awakens. The king of demons is rebelled, carrying the promise of death with him. The users have to find powerful artifacts and weapons to resist this formidable enemy. In the afternoon you are exploring the kingdom, collecting resources and honing your skills, and at night you fight off its minions and prepare for the next monstrous test. The clock is constantly ticking, and each solution can mean the difference between survival and destruction.

item.title: Neon Abyss 2
item.description: Game Description Neon Abyss 2 makes gamers pass procedurally generated levels. The game takes place in a futuristic cyberpunk setting, the title offers a unique mixture of Roguelike mechanics and a stressed platformer action. Users examine the depths of the abyss - a chaotic environment filled with enemies, traps and secrets that are waiting in the wings. Each passage is a new challenge, since the levels in the Title are generated randomly, which prevents two identical ones.

item.title: Robocop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business
item.description: Game Description Robocop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business - this is a separate addition, the action of which takes place after stripping Detroit from criminal groups. Hope for a calm life appears with the construction of Omnitower, a new residential complex from OCP. However, this peaceful undertaking interrupts the capture of the building with a detachment of elite mercenaries, who turned it into an impregnable fortress. Robokop has to storm the tower in order to neutralize the threat and restore the legality, using all his arsenal for this.

item.title: Strings of Fate XI: Magic Dream
item.description: Game Description Strings of Fate 11: Magic Dream transfers a detachment of 5 characters united by ancient prophecies under the control of a player. The awakened evil manifests itself through dreams, invading the life of the heroes, influencing their actions and becoming more and more intrusive. The group needs to determine the origin of these visions in order to prevent a global catastrophe. This task will make them encounter many enemies, develop their abilities and solve centuries -old secrets before their souls and the entire planet are destroyed.

item.title: The Necromincer's Tale
item.description: Game Description The Necromincer’s Tale is a role -playing game in the setting of dark fantasy. The adventure is presented by a top-distance. It is a nobleman to manage a nobleman living in the world of an alternative of the 18th century. The tale of the necromancer is a mystical story full of political conspiracies, dark knowledge and thirst for revenge. Exploring surrounding, everything may not be at all the same as it seems initially.

item.title: Sector Unknown
item.description: Game Description Sector Unknown begins with the fact that the player in the role of a cursory prisoner suffers a crash on a stolen capsule on an abandoned planet Mac. This world becomes a personal stronghold and an operational base for traveling in unknown cosmos open spaces. It is necessary to explore unique locations, each with its own fractions and plots. The main conflict unfolds with the Star Frontier megacorporation, operating the resources and inhabitants of the sector, forcing the protagonist to unite the region with diplomacy or force in order to end the authority of the organization.

item.title: Noobs are coming
item.description: Game Description Noobs Are Coming puts the player in the place of the final boss in the arena, where he will have to fight off the waves of opponents. The main task is to withstand the gradually intensifying attacks of attackers called nobs for a 30-minute round. A list of characters-bosses, which includes a giant worm, queen of spiders or seductive succubus, is offered to choose from. After that, it is necessary to create a unique assembly, equipping the hero with special skills and combined dozens of different attacks for constructing protective tactics.

item.title: Star Rift Saga
item.description: Game Description Star Rift Saga places a player on a distant foreign world, where spatial faults break the fabric of reality. These cosmic gaps threaten to release in the galaxy the devouring planets of essence, which becomes the main task. The mission consists in moving in many biomes to confront these creatures and the subsequent closure of spatial anomalies. The battles require accurate platforming, the use of invulnerable jerks and the ability to fly in order to defeat various opponents and their leaders.

item.title: A Chamber of Stars
item.description: Game Description A chamber of Stars tells about the life of the performer Starr - a musician who has passed through decades of cultural shifts and personal transformation. After many stage images, the change of genres and public scandals, the artist remains a significant figure in the public consciousness. The anticipation of the new album is growing, according to rumors, preparing to become his main work. This journey explores the internal universe of personality, asking the question of what part of yourself can be conveyed through creativity in the world, constantly creating your own myths about you.

item.title: Nelumbra
item.description: Game Description Nelumbra puts the player in the role of the bearer of light, character who fell into a temporary loop without memories of the past. The main task is to fight for the truth of one’s own existence, and the price of this is unknown. Survival is built on the use of rhythmic car autocat and jerks as the surrounding light is extinct, which steadily pumps stress with each action.

item.title: Patapon 1+2 Replay
item.description: Game Description Patapon 1+2 Replay puts a player at the head of creatures called Patapones. As their deity, you give orders, tapping combinations on 4 mystical drums, and this mechanics underlie the entire process. Each bit - Pata, Pon, Don and Chuck - develops into rhythmic sequences for commands of movement, attack and defense. The goal is to bring the tribe to the expedition to the location of the Hushraele, overcoming obstacles.

item.title: EVERY DAY WE FIGHT
item.description: Game Description EVERY DAY WE FIGHT places a group of resistance fighters in a temporary anomaly during an alien invasion. The world and its population were frozen in one moment, and a small detachment remains active, falling into a cycle, where death is not the end. Each time the team dies, time is unwinded back, but the acquired skills and knowledge are preserved with every new round. Players have to lead these people in urban locations in real time, turning into a step -by -step regime for tactical skirmishes with aliens forces.

item.title: Mazgeon
item.description: Game Description Mazgeon is an arcade style game with the study of the dungeons and procedural generation of levels. The player’s main task is to move along these changing labyrinths and accumulate prey. The world is influenced by the essence of a braid, a gloomy reaper, returning from hell to hold his games in the damned city of Mazgeon. Heroes descend into the depths to challenge his servants and find the cause of the widespread curse.

item.title: Devil Spire Falls
item.description: Game Description Devil Spire Falls represents a procedurally generated land, where the last cataclysm has released the damned fog and creatures inside it. The process begins with the creation of the character, the choice of several races and origin with the definition of 7 basic characteristics. The local game world functions through interconnected systems that respond to the presence of avatar and its solution. This environment is the result of the fall of the first devilish spire, which spread the sinister presence in the lands and dungeons, leaving behind the environment indifferent to the well -being of the protagonist.

item.title: Radiant: Guardians of Light
item.description: Game Description Radiant: Guardians of Light puts players in the fantasy world, where progress develops through a direct action. Gamers can explore helium alone or with a companion, determining the pace of their journey. The structure of this Action RPG is focused on elements combining the Hack-And-Slash approach in battle, the development of characters through experience and extensive creation of objects. Fighters constantly face a variety of opponents, preparing for subsequent meetings and significant clashes.

item.title: Rekindled Trails
item.description: Game Description Rekindled Trails sends a player on a trip to collect distant goods in order to restore the destroyed cities in the world of Autheris. With the help of a fiery satellite named, the flame gamer mines fish, minerals and roots from the environment, using a fishing rod, a pick and gloves. These natural gifts serve as the basis for promotion, opening access to new biomes and locations as part of the mission to return the light to the darkened land.

item.title: Longstory 2
item.description: Game Description Longstory 2 continues the established narrative with a large number of dates, developing friendly relations and difficult situations. The action takes place in the summer in front of a high school, immediately after the events of the previous part. During the party, in honor of Marseille’s return, a personality, known as Turkeyhawk, disappears home. This event gives the start of the main riddle, offering the player to find this character.

item.title: Dungeon Mori
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Mori begins with the return of monsters to the world, which has long expelled them. The main task of the player is to get rid of the lands of these creatures and the victory over the great eternal dragon. The research process is built on a choice system that determines the movement and events in the dungeons. The structure is based on step -by -step mechanics combined with solutions during the gameplay.

item.title: Dark Fairy Tale: Dreamland Survivors
item.description: Game Description Dark Fairy Tale: Dreamland Survivors puts a player under the control of Pinocchio, a puppet who has trapped in a hostile and distorted space of nightmares. The character moves around this world by controlling one hand, while the system is automatically introduced to creatures from rethought fairy tales. The promotion depends on the collection and absorption of more than 100 different forbidden dreams of dreams, each of which modifies offensive and defensive capabilities.

item.title: Chinese Frontiers
item.description: Game Description Chinese Frontiers is an atmospheric immersion in the time of ancient China, where users will be able to feel the life of a simple resident of the village. The game is a simulator of life where you have to take under the management of the employee, which is working on the construction of a great Chinese wall. Gamers will be able to test various types of crafts of that time, and will also monitor the character indicators, giving him food, water and rest in time.

item.title: Len's Island
item.description: Game Description Len’s Island is an open world adventure, which is the construction of a base with the possibility of a pharmacy, craft, research and battles. Each player is able to build his own house of dreams, care for crops and simply explore the secrets of the island. If you manage to find a sword, then you can go to more dangerous adventures, fighting with numerous enemies guarding the treasures.

item.title: Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown
item.description: Game Description Thrive: Heavy Lies The Crown is an exciting medieval fantasy urban planning strategy that will check your leadership qualities and make you make a difficult choice to ensure the survival and prosperity of your kingdom. In this game, the fate of your people largely depends on the decisions you have taken, and the path you have chosen - favor or tyranny - will determine your heritage. The will is your weapon, you must build and strengthen your city, form the land and develop your kingdom with the help of a deep technological tree.

item.title: Dragonloop
item.description: Game Description Dragonloop is a metro-vanning that combines manipulations over time with the design of the map, enclosing a player in a repeating 5-day cycle. The main character is a woman who has lost her memory and trapped this temporary loop. Together with a satellite named Ouro, she travels around a two -dimensional world, where strange temporal changes take place. The basis of the gameplay is the study and battles in order to break out of the closed circle, change fate and reveal the truth about the situation.

item.title: Loot of Baal
item.description: Game Description Loot of Baal works from the side panel of the screen, allowing you to play at the same time with other computer tasks. Players collect and send a detachment of mercenaries for battles with demons and obtaining treasures on randomly generated combat locations. The project offers hundreds of fighters, each with unique skills, and a collection of more than 1000 different things for the search. This concept of gameplay facilitates the promotion, because the key adventure occurs in a separate area of the display and does not require constant attention.

item.title: Soulstone Survivors
item.description: Game Description Soulstone Survivors events take place in the gloomy fantasy universe, and the main characters will be the abyss hunters who strive to capture the unique stones of the soul. They have an incredible force capable of turning a carrier into a creature with which only a deity can compare by capabilities. However, it is extremely difficult to get them - for this it will be necessary to first defeat the master of the void.

item.title: Snow Plowing Simulator
item.description: Game Description Snow Plowing Simulator is a relaxing and atmospheric simulator in which cleaning the territory from snow becomes an exciting adventure! Forget about the difficulties of winter cleaning - here you can enjoy snowy beauty and study the surroundings using various tools and vehicles. Start with a simple shovel, and then advance to more serious machines and interchangeable plows systems to complete more and more complex tasks in all corners of the city and mountainous areas.

item.title: Path of the Abyss
item.description: Game Description Path of the Abyss is a single -user project where you have to go to study the dungeons in the fantasy world. Users will test the gameplay mechanics of classical role-playing adventure with elements of Dungeon Crauler. The graphics are made in black and white and stylized under the drawings with a pen. Gamers will create characters and immerse themselves in the study of dark and confusing labyrinths, where dangerous monsters live.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Master Crafted Edition
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Master Crafted Edition puts the player in the center of large -scale conflict, where battles and constant pressure do not leave time for respite. Captain Titus from the Order of Ultramarinov heads a detachment of hardened fighters sent to restrain the invasion of the orcs on an industrial planet. These worlds produce equipment and weapons for the endless war of mankind, and the loss of one of them can lead to catastrophic consequences.

item.title: Covenant of Solitude
item.description: Game Description Covenant of Solitude introduces the story of a young man named Fort, who secretly owns the gift to command monsters in a secluded settlement of the leaves. The carriers of such a force are called ginns - their fate is full of persecution, fear and exploitation from others. The familiar way of life of the hero breaks off when the war breaks into his house, flooding the streets with blood and forcing the fort to accept his essence.

item.title: DELTARUNE
item.description: Game Description Deltarune - spin -off puzzle Undertale, which is talking about the name of the game, acting as an anagram of the word. The difference from the understail is that now there is the opportunity to fight immediately by the team of heroes. They can protect themselves, use magic and many other capabilities. The design and graphic performance has changed significantly. The protagonist of Delta Runa is a boy named Chris.

item.title: Kill the Clock
item.description: Game Description Kill the Clock immerses players in the role of the vengeful protagonist, moving along the gloomy European streets of the mid-1900s and finding that his sworn enemy is already killed by an unknown attacker. Accused of this atrocity, the player must reveal the riddle of the death of his enemy. The investigation occurs inside the repeating temporary cycle, forcing the protagonist to live the same seven -day to live again, while each round offers another option for a deprivation of life, which must be unraveled before the time is overturned, in the intricacies of insidious deception.

item.title: VOID War
item.description: Game Description Void War puts a player at the head of an ancient starship, sending him on a journey to the heart of a dying empire. This ship is described as a powerful and formidable gun filled with secret technologies. The tasks include the reflection of the attacks of crazy cultists, cowardly cosmopirates and xenophobic imperial soldiers. The detection of powerful artifacts allows you to turn a starship into a frightening combat vehicle.

item.title: Cyber Knights: Flashpoint
item.description: Game Description Cyber Knights: Flashpoint is an anti -utopic world in which a modern cyberpunk and a gloomy atmosphere of despair and disobey have intertwined. Since the colonization of the solar system on Earth and in other places, complete anarchy began with illegal trade and hired killers. The player will be in the very center of this new world, exploring his shadow side. Actions take place in 2223 as a result of the environmental disaster and negligence of mankind, the ozone ball was completely destroyed and people were forced to create colonies on more distant planets, the benefit of technology allow.

item.title: Neuroshima Hex
item.description: Game Description Neuroshima Hex is a post -apocalyptic tactical competition adapted from the board game system. The course of events is built on strategic solutions on the hexagonal field. Opponents use various detachments, technologies and their special skills for the implementation of military plans. Mechanics implies the arrangement of chips and determine the moment of their action. In Neuroshima Hex, players fall into the world, surviving the decline of nature, where there is a struggle for resources.

item.title: Ricave
item.description: Game Description Ricave sends a player to an escape from a changeable dungeon, where the movement occurs step by step around the cells. The battles suggest the use of the environment: you can encounter opponents in poisonous water or lure them to barrels with explosives. The state of the character monitors specific ailments, including diseases, bleeding and fractures. The damage here is local: the loss of the leg slows down, the eye injury leads to blindness, and the lack of hands limits the interaction with objects for all creatures.

item.title: Voidsayer
item.description: Game Description Voidsayer takes users to the world, captured by the abyss - all -consuming power, which leaves nothing behind. As one of the few survivors, you must accept this gloomy challenge, armed with a team of monsters. However, unlike others, you can repulse not with simple weapons, but taming and developing creatures. These are not just pets - they will become an integral part of your survival. However, there is one catch.

item.title: CraftCraft: Fantasy Merchant Simulator
item.description: Game Description CraftCraft: Fantasy Merchant Simulator sends gamers on a trip to the world of Windspell, a port city filled with potential and adventures. Users stand in place of a merchant, ready to create unique items that can change the fate of the city. This game is not just about the trade in goods, it is about how to pave your way through creativity. Whether you create intricate necklaces for royal mermaids or a weapon from the blood of dragons - each item has its own charm.

item.title: Elden Ring Nightreign
item.description: Game Description Elden Ring Nightreign is a separate part of the Universe, where the action takes place in Limgrava, the very first district with the open world, presented in the original series. However, this is not the usual version of Limgrave. The world here is procedurally generated, which means that each passage offers unique experience. Users fall into the game with their team of two people, each of whom has their own abilities.

item.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 3
item.description: Game Description fuga: Melodies of Steel 3 unfolds the story of desperate efforts. The inexplicable disappearance of Malta forces the group of children to head to the forbidden cave, where they are leaded by a mysterious voice to Taranis - a powerful armored vehicle, which was considered lost. The determination to find Malta returns them aboard this combat vehicle, starting a direct attack on the central regions of the Berman Empire.

item.title: As We Descend
item.description: Game Description AS We Descend combines Roguelike debiting with strategic gameplay. Gamers command forces in card battles against enemies in the post -apocalyptic city. The fate of mankind is determined by the tactical decisions made on the battlefield and in the political structure of the city. The project includes the creation and development of detachments using the found technologies. Each group has a special set of cards that can be expanded and modified.

item.title: Shape Shifter: Formations
item.description: Game Description Shape Shifter: Formations - This is an exciting two -osti shooter with Rogue -Lite mechanics, which brings a fresh stream in the genre. In this game, gamers have to fight with the waves of geometric enemies, passing through tense scenarios of bullet adhesive hell. Whether it is a single flight or a local cooperative with a friend, Adventure offers a number of tests that will check reflexes and strategic thinking.

item.title: 9 kings
item.description: Game Description 9 Kings throws users into the very heart of the medieval kingdom, where the strategy, tactics and resource management dictates the need for survival. This urban planning Roguelike combines a lot of a mechanic, offering unpredictable experience with each launch. The expansion of the kingdom requires careful planning, because the power of the empire depends on each decision. Using a deck of various cards, rulers form their possessions, adapting to unexpected challenges.

item.title: Coin Push RPG
item.description: Game Description Coin Push RPG combines the mechanics of an arcade machine with elements of pumping characters. In the center of the process is a full-fledged simulator of a classic coin-pusher, where actions directly affect resources. Good luck drums, bonus towers and jackpotes form the rhythm of sessions and provide an influx of coins. It is these coins that launch the actions of fighters subordinates to the player. In the Coin Push RPG project, characters do not enter the battle for free.

item.title: Garden of Witches
item.description: Game Description Garden of Witches will tell about the strength - a girl who makes his way through a dangerous magical world to return order. Its goal is to find the escaped witches who violated agreements and abandoned the garden. The place is rapidly destroyed, but the strength is not going to allow Leni to destroy everything that she built. Each promotion requires actions, choice and readiness for a fight.

item.title: Tinkerlands
item.description: Game Description Tinkerlands offers game experience where the characters find themselves in unknown islands. Survival becomes the main task that encourages the study of these new territories, the creation of the necessary tools and contacts with various inhabitants of these lands. Gamers gradually build personal shelters that can develop into large settlements. Interaction with the environment also opens access to magic, giving additional ways to overcome difficulties. The Tinkerlands universe consists of the main continent, three other large islands and many small islands, each of them provides unique conditions, resources and tests.

item.title: Survive the Fall
item.description: Game Description The disaster in Survive The Fall occurred in 2023, when a huge asteroid crashed into the ground. Most of the population died, and those who were in distant places in the world survived. The player moves to the post -apocalyptic environment, where it is necessary to engage in the construction of settlements, using tactical and strategic elements. An extensive and open world includes many good lands, forests or destroyed cities.

item.title: Cauldron
item.description: Game Description Cauldron is a role project with an emphasis on a system of improvement and the implementation of mini-stories. In the role of NIX, a character who finds himself in a world immersed in darkness will have to explore the environment and look for allies. The structure implies the cycle: the commission of actions leads to strengthening the party, which opens the way to the study of new areas and obtaining content.

item.title: Fantasy Life I: The Girl Who Steals Time
item.description: Game Description In Fantasy Life I: The Girl Who Steals Time, immersion in the atmosphere of leisurely existence within the boundaries of the fantasy world is available. This title includes the possibility of changing roles among 14 different professions called lives. Participants can collect resources by fishing or wood harvesting, cooking, form an island space, or unite with other gamers to confront creatures in extensive areas. The narrative begins with the adventurer’s accession to the team of the archaeologist Edward on a sea journey.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition puts the player in the role of Major Degtyarev, an intelligence officer sent to the cover under the cover. Its task is to find out the causes of the failure of the military operation and the disappearance of the detachment. Events unfold in the Pripyat region, where everything is permeated with dangers: anomalies, radiation, hostile groups and an unstable situation. In Stalker: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition, each action has consequences.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky - Enhanced Edition transfers a gamer to the role of a mercenary named Scar, forced to survive among warring groups, unstable abnormalities and deadly emissions. The action takes place to the events of the previous title of the series, demonstrating the origins of the territorial split in the zone. The basis of the mechanics is the system of wars of fractions - with its help, the user is able to change the alignment of forces between armed formations.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chornobyl - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chornobyl - Enhanced Edition transferred gamers to the alienation zone around the Chernobyl nuclear power plant, where anomalies, armed groups and mutants act outside the law framework. Movement in this territory depends on food supplies, the level of radiation, the number of cartridges and relations with other characters. Plot tasks can be performed in different ways using research, shootings and dialogs. The environment is a constant danger, which requires attention to details, and not following the finished routes.

item.title: Tower of Babel: Survivors of Chaos
item.description: Game Description Tower of Babel: Survivors of Chaos puts a gamer in the face of endless streams of hostile creatures. Subjects develop new skills and strengthen their capabilities. The main task is to climb inside the tower, striving for its top to find the fulfillment of personal, most secret desires. This desire requires a clash with continuous opposition, sometimes at a very expensive price, and adaptation of its state to battle.

item.title: Galaxy HighWays
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Highways puts a player at the head of a star pilot after the discovery of alien gate to mankind led to the destruction of the Earth. The surviving representatives of civilization founded the colony of the last hope - a settlement, which is constantly threatened by the same alien force, striving to detect it. As a pilot of the special forces, the main function is to protect the colony by completing tasks, including attacks on enemy attitudes, the defense of friendly caravans and the seizure of aliens for research.

item.title: Cubic Odyssey
item.description: Game Description Cubic Odyssey is a large -scale project with an open setting that combines the elements of research, survival and creativity. Users move according to procedured planets, interact with a variety of ecosystems and fight with the upcoming force known as red darkness. In the universe there are planets with a changing environment, ancient ruins and settlements inhabited by NPC fraction. Each place is complex tasks and opportunities that require strategic resource management and adaptation.

item.title: Chambers
item.description: Game Description Chambers Simits a gamer in a role -playing shooter with a wild West setting with its own features. The plot puts the protagonist in the world, split by the war for a drink, where the antagonists, known as the Reds, seized power. These enemies divided the territory into separate zones - cameras. The main character moves around this world in search of a specific coffin. An unusual environment combines the elements of the western with gloomy humor and horror.

item.title: Ketz: Galactic Overlords
item.description: Game Description KETZ: Galactic Overlords is a game in a science fiction setting, where gamers participate in the Rowli-hord survival with RPG elements. Each gamer chooses a character and collects items to create unique assemblies using the possibilities received from galactic leaders. These gamers overcome tireless clashes, trying to survive and understand why these powerful figures provide assistance. In Ketz: Galactic Overlords, users improve their combat capabilities through specialized systems. Progresses implies an improvement in the resulting equipment.

item.title: Chronomon
item.description: Game Description Chronomon combines elements of monsters care and the simulation of the farm. Players find themselves in the world after a disaster, where they have to catch unusual creatures, improve their skills and help in restoration. Communication with the settlers and step -by -step battles complement the process of arranging their own allotment of land, and the main task is to form a detachment of pets and control of resources in the proposed conditions.

item.title: Doloc Town
item.description: Game Description Doloc Town - this is a farm simulator in the conditions of post -apocalypse. The player accepts the role of a beginner whose task is to build an existing economy in the desert territory. The environment pushes to the study of its predominantly unexplored areas. Key activity includes the landing of cultures, the construction of the necessary structures and the consistent search for information about the past of this changed world.

item.title: Teddy's Haven - A Fantasy Inspired Shop Simulator
item.description: Game Description Teddy’s Haven - A Fantasy Inspired Shop Simulator puts the player in the role of the owner who controls a small store on the periphery of the mysterious island. The shop specializes in the sale of potions, weapons and various magic wonders for a variety of clientele. Among the buyers are adventurers preparing for campaigns, magicians in search of rare components and other mystical creatures. The main cycle of classes is to replenish the shelves, manage the inventory, set up each aspect of the interior and hiring employees.

item.title: Best Served Cold
item.description: Game Description The Best Served Cold puts a gamer at the Knightsp Rack, an underground bar, working during the dry law in the alternative European city of Bukovia. You take on the role of a bartender responsible for the preparation of cocktails for visitors to the institution. Intections go beyond the maintenance, including direct clashes with persons identified as criminals and the need to navigate in dangerous situations. The main actions include the investigation of the murders taking place in this environment while maintaining the work of the bar.

item.title: Freeride
item.description: Game Description Adventures in Freeride will allow you to look at the mysterious world of spirits, where players will be able to test the skills of telekinesis, taking under the control of the protagonist. In the process of passage, you will have to perform a variety of actions that affect the general story of the narrative and allow you to analyze the character and personality of the user. The game is made in the form of role adventura, where you have to explore three -dimensional locations and communicate with secondary characters.

item.title: Stickman Strikes: Conquer Fantasy World
item.description: Game Description Stickman Strikes: Conquer Fantasy World immerses gamer into a fantasy environment after turning into a steakman with a dragon flame. This universe accepts unusual inhabitants, allowing the style of the stickman to fit into local life. The player will have to achieve goals like capturing castles, the acquisition of land or command of a detachment in this world. The activity is not limited to battles and covers the study of the dungeons, the search for values, trade, farming and the creation of things.

item.title: Conquest Dark
item.description: Game Description Conquest Dark is an action-RPG, whose action takes place 237 years after the arrival of a black planet, the events that led humanity to the threshold of destruction. In this alternative medieval history, the legions of non -life control the fallen kingdoms, the cosmic gods are overthrown, and the ancient original people woke up from sleep. Participants in the events choose dark rituals for interacting with the forces responsible for the collapse of civilization in the setting of fantasy-united with an isometric camera and aspects of mythology.

item.title: Gloamvault
item.description: Game Description GloamVault combines a chaotic excitement of monsters and terrible depths of the dungeons. In the role of an resurrected evil wizard, you have to go through the procedurally generated dungeons, hunting more than 500 monsters. In this world, you are not just fighting - you fascinate creatures and replenish your growing army to go further into the fatal depths of the dungeons. Your party can have no more than five monsters, so you will have to choose wisely and use your dark forces to merge them, creating stronger and unpredictable minions.

item.title: Age of Reforming: The Frelands
item.description: Game Description Age of reforging: The Frelands is a cruel world of the Middle Ages in an alternative world where magic exists, and the gods are quite real and if they are enough to pray and make generous gifts, they can even bless the asking person. There reigns tyranny and lawlessness, and survival is being built in trade. The more successful the seller, the easier he lives, the rest was terribly unlucky.

item.title: Path of Kung Fu
item.description: Game Description Path of Kung Fu throws you headlong into the world, filled with intrigues of martial arts. You start like no one, a nameless face in a huge crowd of supper Kung fu. But this is not some pre -destined path - you yourself determine your fate. Forget about hard classes and linear plot lines. Path of Kung Fu allows you to go to the sandbox overflowing with capabilities. Hundreds of martial arts techniques are waiting for them to master.

item.title: Survivalist: Invisible Strain
item.description: Game Description Survivalist: Invisible Strain - continuation of the game Survivalist. Events take place near Vancouver in Canada. The zombivirus epidemic has been going on for 10 years. People managed to erect settlements, well -guarded from revived dead. However, the defense of the shelters fell for unknown reasons. The survivors go to the hill, hoping to build new outposts. In the game, the survivor: an invisible strain can create your own community.

item.title: SpellroGue
item.description: Game Description SpellroGue immerses players in a world captured by corrupted hollowers. You pick up weapons, but not blades and bows, but powerful spells, fed by unpredictable mana cubes. In this step -by -step game, based on the construction of the decks, spells are pronouncing the manipulation of these cubes. The desired combination will fall out, and you will release fire balls, earthen walls or ark explosions. But the bones are unstable.

item.title: Sunderfolk
item.description: Game Description Sunderfolk is a cooperative role -playing adventure designed for joint passage on one screen. This tactical adventure is designed for a team of up to 4 people traveling together around the Sunderlands world. Title uses personal gadgets as the main interface for gamer commands and information management, instead of familiar controllers. A special program provides this connection by collecting all functions on the display of each smartphone. The company is going to overcome trials in the general virtual world.

item.title: Darkwater
item.description: Game Description Darkwater gives gamers to command a submarine, which ended up in an ice trap on a foreign planet. This is a cooperative horror, designed to work from 1 to 4 people. Survival implies navigation in a hostile environment, clashes with enemy courts and underwater life forms, as well as an active search for resources necessary for further work of submarine. Success depends on the implementation of the necessary actions for existence in underland conditions.

item.title: Escape the Mad Empire
item.description: Game Description Escape the Mad Empire is a Roguelike Dungeon Crawler, promising a mixture of tactical battles and base control. Players collect a detachment of heroes whose survival depends on strategy and resourcefulness. The combat system requires an attentive approach. Each move, each action has weight. Using the area, shelters and objects becomes the second nature, when users move around the battlefield with high rates. The Title is not amenable to simple classification, combining the elements of Roguelike, RPG and Base-Building into unique experience.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered
item.description: Game Description The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered is a large-scale processing on the Unreal Engine 5 engine, completely transforming the appearance of an open world of a cult action-RPG. Title takes 25 times more disk space thanks to comprehensively processed and improved landscape textures. Also, the mechanisms of lighting and background shading were seriously revised with the addition of volumetric effects that change the type of premises and night locations.

item.title: Echoes of yi: samsara
item.description: Game Description Echoes of yi: samsara - an action that includes elements of Chinese culture. Gamers will take on the role of a student of the master of the sword. He was instructed to confront enemies and investigate the circumstances associated with the Jiangu tree. The narrative puts a situation where the player must decide whether to face the opening truth or go in a different way. This adventure includes a study of the world of spirits in an attempt to prevent global cataclysms.

item.title: Traveler's refrain
item.description: Game Description Traveler’s Refrain talks about the wanderings of a protagonist with the name traveler in a forbidden forest who seeks to find his lost lover. It carries a special tool, Buzuki, which begins to vibrate and make sounds when approaching a certain mechanism in this closed area. The tool pronounces the words with a voice devoid of reason, indicating the traveler to find 3 destinies and thereby setting the direction to his subsequent steps.

item.title: Crashlands 2
item.description: Game Description Crashlands 2 Returns you to the crazy world of Wuanop. Flux Deibs, all the beloved intergalactic trucker, was again in a difficult position. This time forget about the transportation of goods. It is about reunite with old friends and getting new, eccentric. But these are not only calls to the old cosmic friends. We are talking about the connections that you create. Friendship with Voanop’s colorful character opens the door, and literally.

item.title: Hollow Survivors
item.description: Game Description Hollow Survivors is Rogue -Like Dungeon Crawler, in which gamers take on the role of one of the last rational Hollow in the world captured by terrible monsters. Then the users have to fight with the endless waves of enemies, rising to the tower, which is under the control of the ominous cult. Along the way, you will find a variety of weapons, improvements and synergistic effects that will help you survive and survive.

item.title: Promise Mascot Agency
item.description: Game Description Promise Mascot Agency offers the gamer to plunge into the life of Kaso-Machi, a damned Japanese town. The main character, Michi, is in exile and must establish the work of the agency of urban masks. Key tasks include hiring these creatures, resolving the problems that arise due to their actions, and clarifying the causes of the protagonist link. Communication with a kick, a living finger with a complex character, is also part of the gameplay while you are trying to make your agency the best in the region through the study of the world and plot events.

item.title: Burden of Command
item.description: Game Description Burden of Command gives players a completely different idea of what projects can be in the theme of World War II. The local scale is considered here, and the focus is a small group of fighters. The gamer is given the opportunity to become the commander of this group, making important decisions in key situations. The guys have to visit hot spots around the world, from Western Europe and ending with Morocco, where the remnants of enemy forces were still based at that moment.

item.title: Gedonia 2
item.description: Game Description gedonia 2 invites gamers to the post -apocalyptic world, where the hero goes in search, full of secrets and discoveries. In this adventure game, created against the background of desolation, an atmosphere that has a study reigns. Users will move through various landscapes, from barren wasteland to flourishing forests, each of which has its own set of problems. Interaction with the environment becomes a key part of the experience, because every corner can hide a new surprise or a hidden threat.

item.title: Kadomon: Hyper Auto Battlers
item.description: Game Description Kadomon: Hyper Auto Battlers calls the gamarines into a world filled with more than 180 creatures who need to collect, fight and develop. The Title combines the elements of autoboeviks, rogeliks and card battles, allowing users to develop unique strategies. The purpose of the game is to assemble the KDOMON team, each of which has various abilities and types in order to pass more and more difficult tests. As you pass, you will encounter powerful bosses and open rare monsters with special abilities.

item.title: Godstone
item.description: Game Description Godstone users will make their way through dark dungeons filled with monsters. 5 different sorcerers are available for a choice, for which you can go to study the ruins of Wiritian. The main task for the protagonist will be the search for a valuable divine stone, which is lost in the depths of gloomy catacombs. The game is an atmospheric dungeon-crawler with elements of the Rowl, where you need to wander the character through two-dimensional locations with the side of the side.

item.title: Within the Cosmos
item.description: Game Description Within the Cosmos is a first -person science fiction role -playing advent of which takes place in 2278. Gamers wake up in a secluded star system, where they face a split human society. This society fights with a growing threat from androids, which leads to serious stress. The background is the star system of Adallio, where users were once part of a mission launched by the united space agency of the Earth.

item.title: LOOK OUTSIDE
item.description: Game Description Look outside is an RPG in the Survival Horror genre, the action of which completely unfolds in one residential building. After an inexplicable event, people who looked out turn into altered creatures, which leads to a collapse of society. Look Outside sets the players to search the building in search of food, supplies and tools. During the study, interaction with various inhabitants occurs - both people and nonhumans. Resource management plays a key role.

item.title: Fate: Reawakened
item.description: Game Description Fate: Reawakened returns the classic experience of passing dungeons with a modern bias. This collection included all four games of the cult series of FATE, offering to visit the old Growl city again and go through the constantly changing gates of the dungeons. Yuzers will have to fight as a procedurally generated dungeons, each of which offers new trials and awards. There are several games in one release, so you will have something to do, and not one of the two adventures will be the same.

item.title: Call of Boba
item.description: Game Description Call of Boba transfers to a small, bizarre town, where they find themselves in the role of assistants, helping to revive the destructive Bob tea store. At first, the task is simple: to cook delicious drinks, attract customers and develop business. But underground is hiding something more. With the onset of night, a completely new world opens, and this is where real adventures begin. Armed with the ingredients for Bob milk tea, users fight enemies to get inspiration for the creations of the store.

item.title: Scholar of the Arcane Arts
item.description: Game Description Scholar of the Arcane Arts is devoted to the use of spells interacting with each other to confront the invasion. The universe flooded five plans of magic, forcing the player to look for new forces. Knowledge is gained through the collection of magic scrolls hidden in different parts of the world. For survival, it is necessary to solve puzzles, explore the secret dungeons and destroy monsters, stereing of powerful artifacts.

item.title: Voids Vigil
item.description: Game Description Voids Vigil is an arena with an Autoboy in the Rogue -Lite style, where the action never stops. Gamers will have to clean the one who flooded the arena of the hordes of robots armed only with automatic weapons, drones and many special abilities. Title maintains interest, offering a variety of modes and complexity settings, which allows you to always find new tests. As you advanced, users should competently dispose of their koga - the key resource, which is used in stores that appear throughout the game.

item.title: Dragonkin: The Banished
item.description: Game Description Dragonkin: The Banished throws you into the world, devastated by dragon blood. Evil creatures that have become a result of dragon blood lurk in the shade. Four heroes rise to challenge this spoiled world. Each of them has unique skills and a chance to rewrite the future. The ice warrior in Dragonkin: The Banished, a barbarian, feeding on the blood of a white dragon, embodies gross power. He wields an ax and hammer, becoming more and more when he cuts and breaks enemies due to his resistance.

item.title: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest
item.description: Game Description Card Survival: Fantasy Forest is a survival simulator that immerses in the very heart of the ancient forest. Title takes users to a world where nature is not only living, but also has its own mind. Here, gamers build a house, overcome daily difficulties and interact with a rich ecosystem full of wild animals, magical creatures and unpredictable forces. Every day brings new difficulties associated with survival: from hunger and health management to solving problems with the weather and seasons.

item.title: Die in the dungeon
item.description: Game Description Die in the Dungeon throws another set of cubes in the Roguelike genre. Forget about the meticulously compiled deck of cards. Instead, you collect your arsenal from a set of cubes, each of which indicates the action: attack enemies, treat wounds or control yourself a throw of fate. Each meeting becomes a gambling game, an exciting test of luck, where one throw can turn the course of the battle.

item.title: AVOWED
item.description: Game Description AVOWED is an adventure role -playing role -playing game, the actions of which unfold on a magic continent called Eora. The developers are people who gave the world such hits as Fallout: New Vegas and The Outer Worlds. The game makes the main emphasis on a journey through the bright world, battles with monsters and skeletons, pumping a hero, etc. It is also necessary to take part in the real war.

item.title: Dead Dragons
item.description: Game Description Dead Dragons launches history 100 years after the victory of people over the dragons - the events that allegedly brought the world. Now rumors about the return of these creatures encourage the protagonist to investigate the case of a mysterious girl associated with the dragon race. This task develops into a conflict that decides the fate of the whole world and raises the main question of the survival of one of the species in the upcoming confrontation.

item.title: DarkBlade ascent
item.description: Game Description In DarkBlade Ascent, the action and strategy are combined into intense gameplay. Gamers can expect random loss of weapons and upgrades during each passage, which makes the game fresh and unpredictable. The Title offers a strategic combat system in which gamers should think in advance, studying enemy schemes and choosing the right moment for impact, evasion or parrying. Choosing the elements or focusing on physical damage, you can choose your style in accordance with the task.

item.title: Novus orbis
item.description: Game Description Novus orbis is a Roguelike designer of decks, inviting gamers to the world, where selected cards and how you play them determine your path. The essence is to master the combo. Each card has its value, and their effect depends on how you arrange them - play the cards in the correct order to maximize their strength, or mix them to get a potentially different result. This emphasis on the strategy gives Tita depth, forcing you to be on the alert while you are guided in complex mechanics.

item.title: Star Knightess aura
item.description: Game Description Star Knightess aura - Anime -Nella, the main character of which is a girl with an unusual name of the aura. She falls into a fantastic world called Roya. The heroine is cursed by the king of demons. Its task is to deal with otherworldly monsters every night. At the same time, it is very important not to lose yourself. The girl has insanity and she begins to consider herself a completely different person.

item.title: Keep Driving
item.description: Game Description Keep Driving immerses in the atmosphere of freedom of a long, slow trip to the procedurally generated world. The action takes place in the early 2000s, you are behind the wheel of your first car, a long road and a festival are ahead, which you need to get to the other end of the country. Passing along the highway and dirt roads, you are faced with difficulties, both from the environment and from the bizarre hitchhiker, looking for a passage.

item.title: Heart of the Machine
item.description: Game Description Heart of the Machine outwardly resembles a town -planning Taikun. But in fact, the project is something like a god of God with elements of tactics and strategy in real time. Only here the Juzer is assigned the role of not a divine being, which owns magic, but artificial intelligence. This video game has a science fiction setting. Its action takes place in a distant and gloomy future in the territory of the metropolis-colonies.

item.title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel
item.description: Game Description Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel invites users to the world immersed in Norwegian mythology, where survival depends on skill and strategy. Moving along the inexorable landscape, gamers are faced with an inexorable stream of enemies. In the center of the game is the idea of confrontation with insurmountable forces, and the waves of enemies experience even the most experienced gamers for strength. Fighting off the hordes, moving through the dark kingdoms, teeming with dangers, is a real challenge.

item.title: Cyclopean: The Great Abyss
item.description: Game Description Cyclopean: The Great Abyss shows the labyrinth of the underworld, full of oddities and difficulties. Locked in a place where there is little what your character should be guided in this dark kingdom with the help of available instruments, unions and decisions. The world is formed by a choice, from battle to dialogue, and each action can open or close the path. Users should manage limited resources such as gold, health and even sanity, to pave their way through a huge, mysterious environment.

item.title: Tyrant's Realm
item.description: Game Description Tyrant’s Realm offers a cruel, but fascinating experience for those who crave trials in their adventures. The Title is a role -playing -adventure game that draws gamers into a world where every step is an adventure, and each death brings new lessons. The design is based on the idea of ​​unpredictability: no passage is the same. Every time you plunge into the game, you are faced with a constantly changing world full of dangers that make you be on the alert.

item.title: Endless Alice
item.description: Game Description endless alice - this is an adventure from a third person with an intriguing combination of elements of the Rowlaik and visual design, inspired by anime. Title invites gamers to explore a huge, constantly changing world, where each solution can determine their path. Six characters to choose from, each of which offers its own set of abilities and styles of battle, allow users to combine them in accordance with their style.

item.title: Threefold Recital
item.description: Game Description Threefold Recital invites gamers to move to bright eastern fantasy, where the overgrown city of Bluscles stands on the threshold of a new era. Once the city was warmed in the rays of the Golden Age, and now it is mired in political instability and tension. Title draws a picture of the world where ancient magic and modern technologies are intertwined, creating a unique mixture that drives the narrative forward.

item.title: Sea Fantasy
item.description: Game Description Sea Fantasy Transes users to the water world, where the war changed the landscape. Seventy percent of the continent is under water, and two young islanders named Rod and Axel find themselves in the center of the crisis. Their mission is to catch the mysterious Seaaz, which is an important part of the plan to prevent the return of a nightmare of biological weapons - a black dragon. Forget about idyllic fishing.

item.title: Deathless. Tales of Old Rus
item.description: Game Description Deathless. Tales of Old Rus immerses gamers in a role -playing game with a deck created against the backdrop of Slavic myths and legends. Explore the vivid world of the Belosweres along with the legendary heroes and terrible creatures from children’s fairy tales at night. Currently, you can take on the role of brave barbarian beautiful, and soon wise Vasilisa will join you. Together you will withstand the growing bestiaria from more than 40 monsters and 8 bosses.

item.title: Tower of Mask
item.description: Game Description Tower of Mask is a kraler that scoops up inspiration in the classic role adventure of the 1980s about dungeons and offering a modern approach to old -school mechanics. Title puts gamers in a huge mystical tower, where they have to fight enemies, solve complex puzzles and overcome various tests. The goal is simple, but ambitious: climb the tower and get to the top. However, this journey is not at all simple.

item.title: Fernageddon
item.description: Game Description Fernageddon begins the global burning campaign, during which the player acts as a champion of the great god of fire. The main task is to incinerate the world in accordance with the will of the deity about complete destruction. A novice novice goes on this journey, accumulating skills, studying spells and finding followers to help in total annihilation. Successful conquests bring the favor of a capricious idol, opening access to increasing power and legendary weapons.

item.title: Caves of QUD
item.description: Game Description Caves of QUD-A game in the sling genre with an unusual mixture of styles, such as: fantasy (ordinary swords and bows as a weapon of murders, are combined with magic and marvelous creatures), post-apocalypse and science fiction. A feature will be the choice of a protagonist before the start of each new preservation with his bonuses. The mutant receives unlimited scope for various modifications, by obtaining changes in his DNA, in other words, mutations, among which there is a second heart, second head, wings, claws and much more.

item.title: New Arc Line
item.description: Game Description New Arc Line is a game that invites gamers to venture into a city where the line between magic and technology is not just thin, it’s practically non-existent. Set in the sprawling steam-powered metropolis of Newark, it immerses players in a world where secrets lurk in every corner and power is as fickle as the magic and the machines that power it. The city is a place of contradictions: elegant but corrupt, vibrant but mired in inequality.

item.title: Sin Slayers: Reign of The 8th
item.description: Game Description Sin Slayers: Reign of The 8th immerses users in a dark, unforgiving world, where every corner is fraught with new dangers and moral dilemmas. In this turn-based strategy game, players take on the role of a group of adventurers, each representing one of the Seven Deadly Sins. Their mission? Confront monstrous enemies, travel through dark and twisted places, and ultimately confront the formidable Eighth Sin - Fate. This latest installment in the Sin Slayers series expands on the formula of its predecessor, introducing new regions, improved mechanics, and an even deeper story that will force players to question not only the fate of their characters, but the very nature of sin.

item.title: Atlyss
item.description: Game Description Atlyss is a role -playing advent with an open world, which represents to gamers a vast and surreal universe. It is filled with various creatures and mysterious locations, inviting users to explore each of its corners. Users themselves can choose how to interact with the world: to cooperate with others or to cope with difficulties alone. Dynamic nature allows them to adapt their style, raising a sense of responsibility for their experience.

item.title: Scourge of the village
item.description: Game Description Scourge of the Village takes gamers on an eerie journey through a mountain village shrouded in mystery and supernatural elements. Set against the backdrop of Chinese folk horror, the plot revolves around an investigation that goes wrong. Chen Xi, a trainee reporter, begins investigating a wastewater discharge incident at a factory, but soon finds himself in a much more alarming situation. As she navigates the twisted paths of reality and dreams, the boundaries between the two worlds blur, and what was once an investigation into environmental crimes turns into a struggle to understand the tragic history of the village.

item.title: Luma Island
item.description: Game Description Luma Island sends users on a trip full of research, discoveries and tests. Regardless of whether you go alone or unite with friends, this adventure is a world full of possibilities. The island offers a wide range of classes - from the construction of the farm of his dreams to the discovery of hidden treasures and solving confusing puzzles. This is a game in which you can plunge into a bright world, constantly discovering something new for yourself and moving forward at your own pace.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl is a first-person shooter in a post-apocalyptic world. The events of the game will develop in the exclusion zone formed as a result of the disaster at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant. In 2006, a new catastrophe occurred, which led to various physical, chemical and biological processes, creating many anomalies, artifacts and generating a large number of mutants. The gameplay is a classic FPS with elements of a role-playing game, immersive sim and horror.

item.title: Incantation
item.description: Game Description Incantation is a first-person horror game that immerses gamers in the eerie world of Chen Village, where danger and mystery are never left behind. As the main character, a mother desperately searching for her missing daughter, users will have to navigate the web of secrets, rituals and cults that seem to seep from every crack in the village walls. The plot unfolds gradually, and with each step more and more information is revealed about the strange forces operating in the village.

item.title: D.A.M. Champion
item.description: Game Description D.A.M. Champion is a nonlinear role -playing game focused on the collection of creatures and step -by -step battles. The action takes place in the anti -utopian world, where the economy is directly related to the technology of creating and managing artificial copies of wild monsters. This copying technique is also the main tool that people use to study creatures that inhabit their environment. The player falls into this society as a tamer, collecting a detachment and participating in a system where living entities are read by a product.

item.title: My Hotel
item.description: Game Description Users inMy Hotel have to try their hand at being a novice businessman who is going to set up a small hotel and gradually develop it. You will have to buy a dirty and in terrible condition of a house in which you can arrange rooms for living and set up a reception. It is necessary to wash all the floors, clean the furniture from dust and do everything possible to make an attractive and prestigious appearance for the building.

item.title: TIME SOUL
item.description: Game Description TIME SOUL is an action-platformer with a unique approach to the usual souls-like genre. In a universe where time is both weapon and enemy, gamers will battle through procedurally generated worlds filled with treacherous platforms, unexpected obstacles and formidable enemies. Moving forward, users will fight with the guardians of time, collect fragments and clocks, trying to prevent the complete collapse of time. It’s a race against time, literally, as the ultimate goal is to defeat the Time Lord within a limited time of 60 minutes.

item.title: Codex Lost
