When going to The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker, you have to complete a large number of tasks and gain experience that allows you to upgrade and improve your character’s characteristics or add new skills and abilities.

item.title: Research Story
item.description: Game Description Research Story offers to go on a fascinating journey through a mysterious area and help Violet Archive with a recording of exotic plants and creatures. This is a colorful farm simulator that you definitely should try! It is necessary to explore the chimerbruck and its environs, find and write down a variety of plants and creatures, as well as breed your unique garden and take care of pets. In addition, you will have to establish relations with local residents and fulfill various quests.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy
item.description: Game Description Hogwarts Legacy is a role-playing game based on the famous books about the boy wizard “Harry Potter”. The events of Hogwarts: Legacy take place long before the birth of the main character of the books and films. The story dates back to the 19th century, specifically in the 1800s. The game takes place in the same universe and in the same school, so fans of the original saga will find many references and meet some familiar characters.

item.title: Caves of Lore
item.description: Game Description Caves of lore-role-playing game with two-dimensional pixel art style graphics and from above. Moving by locations occurs in real time. During the study of the area, you can neutralize traps, look for secrets and hack chests with loot. Equipment can be of different colors. Coloring depends on the rarity of the object. There are hundreds of things here. Battles with monsters are held in step -by -step mode. In battle, heroes can move around the cells.

item.title: Lil Gator Game
item.description: Game Description Lil Gator Game from the first minutes creates a positive atmosphere and invites you to completely immerse yourself in this friendly world. Here, users take on the role of a little crocodile who wants to make new friends. But they need help, so the character will have to get down to business, completing their quests and instructions. And given that the main location in the game is a national park, you will have to spend a lot of time exploring individual areas and finding solutions.

item.title: KYNSEED
item.description: Game Description KYNSEED is a role -playing game in an adventure genre and a life simulator in an open world. The game saw the light in 2018 and has already managed to find its own fan base. The essence of the passage is to completely immerse into the invented world, filled with various inhabitants, who have their own affairs and habits. The player is invited to interact with these characters, simultaneously equipping his own life.

item.title: Fabular: Once Upon a Spacetime
item.description: Game Description Fabular: Once Upon a Spacetime allows users to go to the study of the galaxy by taking space knights. The game is a role-playing adventure with elements of Rowl, where you have to move along the retro-futuristic universe in order to save the kingdom from the Lords of the abyss that abducted the sun. The protagonist will be a noble traveler, which is the last hope for the salvation of mankind.

item.title: Winter Falling: Battle Tactics
item.description: Game Description Winter Falling: Battle Tactics invites gamers to lead the troops and lead them to victory in the most stressful and tactical battles. And only your mind can save the dying world from devastation. You control a detachment of mercenaries, collect supplies and troops, perform tasks and even you can burn villages if you decide that you need it. But do not forget that all your actions have consequences.

item.title: Mount and Blade 2: Bannerlord
item.description: Game Description Mount and Blade 2 Bannerlord is a role-playing game with elements of medieval wars, the action of which takes place 200 years before the start of Part 1. In this sequel you will find an improved combat system and an enlarged game world - Calradia. Fight with hundreds of troops under your command and take direct part in the battles as one of the soldiers. You can storm enemy fortresses and destroy fortifications with siege weapons in Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord.

item.title: Persona 5 Royal
item.description: Game Description Persona 5 Royal is the official expansion for the fifth part of the Japanese role-playing video game of the same name, which contains even more unique personas, as well as a lot of interesting quests and items. The plot centers on a seemingly ordinary high school student who goes with his family to Tokyo, where he enrolls in a new school. Soon the main character begins to see inexplicable dreams, in which someone tells the guy that a monstrous catastrophe will befall him in the near future.

item.title: Vampire Survivors
item.description: Game Description Survival in theVampire Survivors universe is based on minimalist gameplay, where you have to move around the map and knock out as much gold as possible. The main task for the protagonist is to advance through the levels generated in roguelight style. You need to try to survive the night, fighting off monsters and higher undead. Vampires will hunt for the protagonist, not giving him the opportunity to rest at a rest or come up with a future plan of action.

item.title: Brok The Investigator
item.description: Game Description Brok The Investigator is an adventure role -playing game that combines the elements of the action, quest and detective. In the center of history, anthropomorphic creatures. You play for a crocodile-drinker named Brock, investigating a mysterious case. During the game, you have to use not only the bright mind, but also the fists. Choose a detective that has to play. You can be a good cop, trying to resolve conflicts with the help of a good word, or you can knock out information through rough power.

item.title: Star Valor
item.description: Game Description Star Valor gives many opportunities: to explore the huge expanses of the galaxy on the cosmic shuttle, to extract resources, to trade, to fight and create your own weapons. With the help of flexible tools, you can configure the ship by your own preference. Each decision -making affects relations with fractions and has its consequences. At the start, it is necessary to take the place of the captain of a small ship, to fulfill simple instructions and hire small personnel.

item.title: Ctrl Alt Ego
item.description: Game Description Ctrl Alt Ego uses a science fiction setting. The action takes place in the gloomy future. The plot is dedicated to the fate of human consciousness. The game is a first -person shooter and an immersion simulator. It must be controlled by the incorporeal ego of the protagonist. The main character can instill in robots and objects (for example, doors or computers). He cannot really die. In the case of the destruction of the membrane, the hero simply returns to the form of the spirit and does not lose progress.

item.title: Alaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms
item.description: Game Description Action RPGAlaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms takes the player into the magical Middle Ages. The story begins in the Valley of Storms - a place where four legendary peoples intersect: Humans, Elves, Dwarves and Orcs. It is here that the cruel god Alaloth is imprisoned. From the very kingdom of the dead, he poisons all kingdoms with his evil. Soon monsters, storms, diseases and mighty dragons will strike this world.

item.title: Surroundead
item.description: Game Description Surroundead is a survival simulator in the open world where the apocalypse happened. In the indie project, you can switch between the view from the first and third-party. Its three -dimensional graphics are made in Low Poly style. According to the plot, a zombie virus appeared on Earth. For 5 years, people fought to him unsuccessfully. As a result, the planet has changed forever. Along the devastated streets, living dead began to roam, and civilization in its level of development rolled back to dark times.

item.title: Symphony of War: The Nephilim Saga
item.description: Game Description Symphony of War: The Nephilim Saga tells about the events that erupted after the conflict between the Empire of Veridia and Tanra. They fought for a long time, and in the end all these events led to the fact that the first empire remained in losses. However, thanks to the young ruler of Florin, a shaky, but peace finally formed. Everyone began to gradually recover until something terrible happened.

item.title: Keplerth
item.description: Game Description The events of the futuristic Indo-video trigger Keplerth unfold in the distant future-on the previously unknown planet Kepler. According to the genre, the project can be attributed to the simulator of survival with the possibility of construction and RPG elements. According to the plot, people built a large spaceship, which was supposed to transport the colonists on board to the nearest planet suitable for life. But there is a disaster, as a result of which the ship crashes on an unknown planet.

item.title: Old World
item.description: Game Description Old World in the past was also known as 10 Crowns. The game is a step -by -step global strategy in the antique setting. The gameplay is strikingly different from the games of this genre: it is allowed to give several orders to Unit in one move. Such a resource as “orders” is responsible for additional moves. The more recognition points, the more moves can be made. The resource “Order” can be used in different ways: in battle, in construction, in events or diplomacy.

item.title: Coromon
item.description: Game Description Coromon is a role-playing indie adventure about taming animals for their further fights among themselves, according to the type of Pokemon. This project uses a rare pixel visual design as a tribute to the game industry of the last century. The camera is at an angle to create an isometric view of the world around the world, which is much more examined in this position. The single -user campaign of this game will take a gamer not for one day, and a thorough study will require even more free time.

item.title: Black Geyser: Couriers of Darkness
item.description: Game Description Black GEYSER: Couriers of Darkness - role -playing party game based on classical mechanics of old -school RPG: isometric camera, active pause, etc. The team can have up to 5 people. At the same time, the campaign can be passed alone, traveling around the world only the main character. As in any worked out and large -scale role -playing game, you have to perform many epic quests, pump your abilities, choose a character class and even build a romantic relationship.

item.title: Elden Ring
item.description: Game Description Elden Ring is an open world role-playing game from the creators of Dark Souls and Bloodborne, in collaboration with writer George R.R. Martin. The gameplay is a third-person action RPG where you explore the expanses of a fantasy world, equip yourself with a variety of weapons and fight powerful enemies. In the game, even one enemy poses a serious threat. Battles are based on timing and parries. Carefully study the monsters' patterns to effectively counterattack their attacks.

item.title: Dying Light 2: Stay Human
item.description: Game Description Dying Light 2: Stay Human starts 15 years after humanity became infected with a terrible virus. Many have turned into zombies who scour in search of living flesh, and the few survivors wage a daily struggle for existence. People are divided into several warring factions, which during the day make forays from shelters to find resources, and at night they hide from bloodthirsty monsters. The world has returned to its primitive state, where everyone fights only for their own lives.

item.title: Mirror 2: Project X
item.description: Game Description Mirror 2: Project X follows the adventures of Dinkudin Naoto, who collaborates with the FBI (Federal Bureau of Research and Conservation). The hero searches for mystical manifestations and otherworldly creatures that sometimes appear in the world. The plot begins with a story with a Demon that infects the body of one of the victims. During the proceedings and investigation of the case, the protagonist will find out the motivations and goals of the creatures in order to make a choice to support or destroy the monster.

item.title: Idle Calibur
item.description: Game Description Idle Calibur combines a study of the open world with tactical RPG tactical and real -time mechanics in real time. The gameplay is focused on the construction of a city, which serves to recruit heroes with special abilities. Battles can be automatically due to IDLE function, or you can take direct manual control of your detachments during the fight. Key tasks include the collection of forces to attack other settlements on the world map and participate in structured tests with bosses for development.

item.title: God of War (2022)
item.description: Game Description God of War 2022 is an action-adventure game with a third-person view. This project is both a sequel to the previous part and a restart of the entire universe of the famous, cult slasher about the adventures of Kratos – a Spartan warrior, the protagonist of all 8 games in the “God of War” series, fighting against various gods and mythical creatures in a fit of rage and revenge.

item.title: Monster Hunter Rise
item.description: Game Description Monster Hunter Rise is a role-playing adventure set in the fictional village of Kamura. The territory is presented in the form of a vast mountainous area with studied hunting equipment and the original culture of the inhabitants. Players will play the role of hunters, and before starting the game they will have to choose one of several types of weapons, armor or special abilities. The world is filled with ancient ruins, shrines, dungeons and other locations.

item.title: Sands of Salzaar
item.description: Game Description Sands of Salzaar is a strategic game whose actions unfold in the Salzaara desert. Fight with numerous hostile factions, gathering your own army and developing your city. Choose your character, profession and faction, on whose side your army will have to fight. The eastern land is filled with various secrets and you have to solve them all. Sands of Salzaar events talk about an exotic old empire that once ruled the desert.

item.title: Gunfire Reborn
item.description: Game Description The shooterGunfire Reborn contains elements of a roguelike and role-playing game. The player can choose to control several heroes with individual abilities. The game has a huge amount of randomness, from procedurally generated locations to dropped guns and loot. Gunfire Reborn is designed for both one and a company of up to 4 people. The game features 100 different types of items. Various mechanics will encourage you to study each fighter presented, who are more or less suitable for a specific situation and location.

item.title: Dysmantle
item.description: Game Description Dysmantle offers gamers to survive on the island and find a way to get out of this place. The local post -apocalyptic world is not gloomy. There is no atmosphere of hopelessness here either. The game has a bright cartoon graphics with juicy colors. During the end of the world, the protagonist hides in an underground bunker. Once the hero crawls out and discovers that people and animals have turned into evil creatures similar to zombies.

item.title: Honkai Impact 3RD
item.description: Game Description Honkai Impact 3RD is a role-playing game with Hak-N-Slash elements, in which players manage three heroes called Valkyrie at once. The fighting is realized in real time. You can move freely across the battle of the battle, switching on the go between the characters. Each protagonist has its own unique features and skills. Combining their capabilities, it is necessary to look for effective tactics against enemies. The project is closely related to Genshin Impact.

item.title: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya
item.description: Game Description Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya takes gamers to a fictional Japanese town called Gensoke, where the young and very charming owner of the local night izakaya lives. This term usually refers to a night drinking establishment where people gather, usually after a night shift, and drink alcoholic beverages. The protagonist is the beautiful Mistia Lorelei, who has a dream to make the entire establishment the most popular in the city.

item.title: Elijah and the out of this world adventure
item.description: Game Description Elijah and the out of this world adventure will show a journey through Cleveland, Ohio, where a regular night turns into an incredible nightmare. The story begins with the fact that Elijah, a simple person working in a local grocery store, is attacked by an alien creature after the end of his shift. Waking up, he sees that his hometown in chaos. The military blocked the territory, and to explain the situation they come up with a bizarre legend about the spill of chemicals.

item.title: The Doors of Trithius
item.description: Game Description The Doors of Trithius is a RPG -Rogalik in the fantasy world with procedurally generated content. Here you have to fight monsters, avoid traps, collect prey and much more, traveling along the mysterious world of Enalia. Every time you start the game, you have to explore the new generated city, dungeon and map of the world. Movement and battle use a unique time system, returning the priority of the player based on the speed of weapons or action, maintaining tactical decisions, as well as knowledge about your enemies.

item.title: Death Trash
item.description: Game Description Death Trash is an isometric RPG in the world of post -apocalypse, in which there is total devastation and harsh pancakes with guns. The game is a mixture of cyberpunk, science fiction, horrors and dark fantasy. All locations are made manually. The storyline can be held both alone and in the company with a friend. There is a splitiskrin mode. Game events take place on the Nexus planet.

item.title: Wrestling Empire
item.description: Game Description In Wrestling Empire the player becomes a participant in the World Lightweight Championship. It is necessary to manage an athlete in the ring, apply his abilities and win rivals. The battles are presented in real time with extensive visual effects. This part includes a smooth frequency of personnel and modern graphics, while leaving the atmosphere of retro-style. This version has more functions and capabilities in pumping and battles. The user will face unique opponents with the original characteristic and special skills.

item.title: Tunguska: The Visim
item.description: Game Description After the fall of the meteorite, in Tunguska: The Visitation begins the invasion of mutants. Having fallen to the ground in the Tunguska area, the alien body caused the transformation of all local residents. As a result, a special zone is formed here, the main goal in which is to survive and survive against enemies. The game often has to make a difficult choice, on the result of which its own existence depends.

item.title: Going Medieval
item.description: Game Description Going Medieval is a simulator in which you need to build a fortress on the ruins of an old castle and equip it to protect your settlement. Any event can affect the mood of your people, so you need to satisfy all their needs and be a good king. Events unfold in the era of the dark Middle Ages of the late XIV century. Only five percent of the population survived after a heavy plague epidemic.

item.title: Mr. Prepper
item.description: Game Description Mr. Prepper is a construction simulator where you have to build a bunker under a residential building. Mr. The survivor of those who believe in the theory of conspiracies and understands that a serious threat of nuclear war hung over the world. He does not care about his neighbors and those who do not believe him, so he alone begins to build his own bomb shelter. The nuclear war is close and you must be ready!

item.title: Firework
item.description: Game Description The dark journey of the boy inFirework allows gamers to find themselves in dangerous environments where they must survive and solve difficult puzzles. The game presents the opportunity to go investigate a mysterious fire that killed many people. The main character, named Lin Lixun, goes to explore the territory where the disaster occurred. In the process of clarifying the circumstances, the young policeman is forced to deal with mysterious phenomena and confusing facts that overlap with each other.

item.title: Valheim
item.description: Game Description Valheim is a survival in the open world where you will build your own base and fight with the mythical creatures of Scandinavian folklore. The events of the game take place in Valheim - the tenth world of the Vikings. The goal of the hero is to get to the gate of Walgalla. Killing various monsters and monsters, you earn the blessing of the gods. The hero will visit the most diverse corners of the world: thick forests, snowy mountains and much more.

item.title: OMORI
item.description: Game Description Two realities and only one is true in the gameOMORI. A psychological history of surrealism with elements of thriller and horror. The protagonist will have to travel between two dimensions. They are similar, and at the same time radically different. Each reality has its own mysteries and secrets. Explore the new (old) world, make acquaintances with friendly characters who, in another reality, will immediately attack you. Explore the memories of your own path, and finally determine which world is the real reality for you, and which is the other world.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077
item.description: Game Description Cyberpunk 2077 is an action role-playing game, the events of which unfold in the futuristic city of Night City, located on the West Coast of the United States. You will play as a protagonist named V (or V). The sex, gender and appearance of the hero must be set independently. Depending on the choice of class, the character’s background differs. There are three of them: Nomad, Child of the Street and Corporate.

item.title: Hades
item.description: Game Description In the roguelikeHades you will constantly engage in epic battles. Upgrade new abilities by fighting enemies. Gifts can be acquired by meeting the gods of Olympus, who will be happy to give you a piece of their power. Complete the instructions of Zeus, Athena, or simply get to know them to master new skills or equipment. Every time you meet a new character, you will witness some interesting event.

item.title: Crusader Kings 3
item.description: Game Description Crusader Kings 3 is a global strategy that significantly expands the capabilities of the previous part. Crusader Kings 3 covers the time period from 1066 to 1453. Unlike the second part, you won’t be able to start the game at any time. The new map stretches from Spain to Burma and Mongolia, and from Scandinavia to Central Africa. The scale of the game is quadrupled. The points on the map represent not only counties, but also baronial possessions.

item.title: Chronicon
item.description: Game Description Chronicon has a large amount of content, despite its indie-production. There are about 900 skills, abyles and perks and 700 items. The main campaign is divided into 4 acts: a fallen temple, an elven war, Clerburg Castle and dangerous wastelands. Of the classes, the choice is available: Templar, berserker, guard and sorcerer. These are a kind of analogue of the paladin, warrior, archer and magician. Each has various talent branches with active and passive skills.

item.title: Horizon Zero Dawn Complete Edition
item.description: Game Description Horizon Zero Dawn is an action game in the world of a post-apocalyptic future, in which the world is inhabited by robotic dinosaurs that destroyed modern civilization. The few surviving people formed into small primitive tribes and resist mechanical monsters using primitive weapons combined with high technology. The main character of Horizon Zero Dawn is a girl named Aloy. She was raised by a man named Rast, who is an Outcast.

item.title: There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension
item.description: Game Description There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is a humorous adventure game where you have to click on every element available in the locations. You are taken on an amazing adventure through different video game universes. The visual style of the game is made in a 2D pixel style. Each of the numerous characters in There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is voiced and played by professional actors. On your way there are many puzzles that need to be solved in an unconventional way.

item.title: Travellers Rest
item.description: Game Description Travellers Rest gives the opportunity to live the life of an innkeeper. You own a small tavern that you dream to turn into a noisy and crowded place in the district. But to achieve this goal, you need to work a lot. Build a bro -up and cook the most delicious beer. Manage the farm and serve only the best products on the table. Satisfy customer requests and gain popularity so that a whole kingdom speaks of your institution!

item.title: Persona 4 Golden
item.description: Game Description Persona 4 Golden is a role-playing game about a group of friends who are able to summon demons from the other world. To do this, it is enough to shoot yourself in the temple. The events take place in the small Japanese town of Inaba. The children in Persona 4 are teenagers going through puberty. The heroes are investigating a mysterious series of murders. The gameplay of Persona 4 Golden contains elements of a visual novel.

item.title: Fallout 76
item.description: Game Description According to the plot ofFallout 76, the first people came out of shelters after a nuclear war. They set off to explore the Wasteland, where mutants are already lying in wait. The player will be able to visit 6 regions, each of which has its own types of dangerous animals and landscape. Among the scorched desert there are also wooded areas with red trees. What is most surprising is that quite recently the desert territories were inhabited by those who were able to survive the apocalypse on the surface.

item.title: Borderlands 3
item.description: Game Description Borderlands 3 is a continuation of the acclaimed series of shooters, containing tons of loot. The player will take on the role of one of the Vault Hunters and set off to explore the expanses of Pandora. All heroes have their own tree of characteristics, unique abilities and character. The gameplay allows you to go through the adventure solo or enlist the help of friends. The protagonist of Borderlands 3 learned to climb ledges and make tackles.

item.title: The Test
item.description: Game Description The Test is a psychological horror with elements of a visual novel, role-playing adventure, and immersive sim with a lot of text monologues inside the protagonist’s head. The player gets the opportunity to directly influence what is happening using a decision-making system of varying degrees of importance. The isometric camera allows you to get the best view of the two-dimensional space where all the action of the single-player campaign takes place with a well-developed plot about mental suffering.

item.title: Senren＊Banka
item.description: Game Description Senren＊Banka is primarily aimed at anime fans. The project uses the appropriate style (including chibi art) and Japanese voice acting. The plot combines romantic, tragic, mystical and humorous elements. The story revolves around supernatural incidents. A group of young people are trying to hide them from ordinary people. The premise in Senren＊Banka: A Thousand Colors of Love is as follows. A guy named Arichi Masaomi comes to the provincial town of Hoori in the summer.

item.title: Stoneshard
item.description: Game Description Come in the role of a harsh mercenary in a harsh, ruined war, kingdom. Take part in step -by -step battles and examine the RPG elements of Stoneshard, available in the gameplay. You can perform contracts, secondary and plot missions. Heal the wounds, purchase equipment and improve the protagonist as soon as you wish. Freely move around the big and seamless world. Explore the villages lying in the ruins, go down to the dungeons or look into abandoned tracts.

item.title: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
item.description: Game Description In the epic gameStar Wars Jedi: Fallen Order you will find amazing adventures, new challenges, modern graphics and high-quality laser sword battles! Immerse yourself in this saga of the Jedi and intergalactic war, in which you will play one of the key roles. The story takes place after Episode III, 5 years after the ominous Order 66. You will take on the role of a young Jedi Padawan who barely managed to escape from a trap created by the Sith.

item.title: Disco Elysium: The Final Cut
item.description: Game Description Disco Elysium is an RPG in which a detective must use his skills to conduct a unique investigation. The player will have to interrogate well-developed characters, investigate murders, and, if desired, take bribes. You can become either the savior of the city or the worst disaster for all humanity. Game Features: Unique branched dialogue system. Wide freedom of choice both in the story narrative and in additional tasks. Well-developed characters with their own stories and personalities.

item.title: Streets of Rogue
item.description: Game Description A new measures come to a prosperous futuristic city, which introduces a dry law. This caused the rebellion and chaos in Streets of Rogue. The inhabitants of the town created the headquarters of resistance, which is hidden underground. They plan to overthrow a cruel dictator, so we need a hero who will fulfill this task. Having chosen the class of the protagonist, the user will begin his path from the lower floor.

item.title: Unheard
item.description: Game Description Unheard is a well-developed detective simulator with many implemented mechanics aimed at allowing the player to understand the crimes committed in various ways. A team of indie developers worked on the project, with a rather unusual idea and implementation, who decided to use the setting of detective fiction, because the protagonist uses devices that are not available in the real world. The devices make it possible to establish some kind of invisible connection between criminals and lawmen.

item.title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
item.description: Game Description Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice is an incredibly challenging action game that makes feudal Japan look dark, burning, and beautiful at the same time. The third-person stealth action game combines the features of RPGs and the themes of Souls games. Well-designed graphics of feudal Japan allow us to plunge into the difficult process of returning our master of the Ashina clan. The leader of the opposition - Genichiro - kidnapped a samurai from Shinobi, and now we must cope with a huge number of his followers in order to save the teacher, master, master and good friend who paid us well in a past life.

item.title: Slay the Spire
item.description: Game Description InSlay the Spire the main task of the gamer is to climb to the upper levels of a tower consisting of many rooms. During the passage, you can have one of 4 characters, collect a collection of cards, defeat intermediate enemies and defeat the main villain. The locations and forks of the tower are constantly changing, the whole process can be divided into three acts and at the end of each of them the main character must defeat the local boss.

item.title: Kenshi
item.description: Game Description Kenshi forces you to survive from the very first minutes of the game. An impressive RPG with an open world and the ability to create your own squad, the remaining player privileges are gradually revealed to us. For example, you can build your own buildings in any location, conquer them from other factions, create your own business, sell goods in peaceful settlements, craft whatever you want, explore the environment and do whatever you want.

item.title: Pocket Rogues
item.description: Game Description Pocket Rogues is a role RPG created in the fantasy genre with pixel graphics. The plot tells us about the young young man, who is the seeker of treasures, he found the greatest and mysterious dungeon. Many heroes did not return from here, but we are destined to see a real evil. Ambition, a thirst for wealth and genuine interest simply do not leave a gamer. The gamer has to break through with each subsequent battle through many levels, the generation of which is carried out by an endless random creation.

item.title: Assassins Creed Odyssey
item.description: Game Description For the first time in the history of the series, you will be able to choose a character for whom you will administer justice and change history. Assassin’s Creed Odyssey is the first slasher RPG in the history of the developers, in which we do not play as an assassin, but choose a real warrior of Ancient Greece! We are offered two characters to choose from: Alexios or Kassandra.

item.title: SCUM
item.description: Game Description SCUM is another survival game set in a completely open world. The developers tried to make the gameplay and the story of the characters so absurd that the very fact of some actions causes disgust. The plot reveals to us a modern society that wants nothing more than to “watch the spectacle.” The well-known producer TEC1 organized a show with the name - Scam - where people are thrown out in an open location, forced to survive without everything, and after that they are gradually introduced to a series of difficulties: a zombie epidemic, robots, dangerous animals, or money with the promise that once they get out , players will be able to spend them to buy freedom in the new society.

item.title: MONSTER HUNTER: WORLD
item.description: Game Description The gameplay ofMONSTER HUNTER: WORLD has been slightly reworked compared to the previous part. We don’t just kill monsters, make new equipment, but now weapons are divided into several classes, and, in fact, at the beginning of the game we are something like a “neutral character”. In the new ecosystem, hunters have emerged who will create incredibly difficult conditions for the existence of monsters. Dragons, flying dinosaurs (not like dragons), and other creatures inhabit this eco-system.

item.title: Yakuza 0
item.description: Game Description As a dialogue-heavy role-playing game that explores a deep story,Yakuza 0 claims to be a game that combines friendship, self-love, and the search for true calling. The Yakuza is the largest mafia group in Japan, which controls everything that can be controlled. Events begin in 1988, when two Yakuza characters - Kazuma Kiryu and Goro Majima - take part in a battle for a small industrial plot in the center of Kamurocho.

item.title: DARK SOULS: REMASTERED
item.description: Game Description DARK SOULS: REMASTERED is an already iconic Japanese action/RPG released in 2011. The development was carried out by From Software. A remastered version was released in May 2018 at the instigation of QLOC. So, what are the acclaimed “Dark Souls”? Firstly, this is a high-quality action RPG, with a third-person view. At the very beginning, you will need to set a number of characteristics for your character: appearance and class.

item.title: Conan Exiles
item.description: Game Description Conan Exiles is an amazing multiplayer survival game with RPG and action elements. Employees of the Norwegian company Funcom worked on the project. The project was released at the end of spring 2018. Stunning graphics are a rare quality that developers of various MMORPG games pay attention to. But this time everything happened exactly the opposite. Funcom, 10 years before Conan Exiles, had already released a similar game called Age Of Conan.

item.title: Mirror
item.description: Game Description Mirror is a visual novel that perfectly combines erotic content, an RPG component, an interactive plot and battles in which you take a direct part. The whole game is built on the “three in a row” principle. In the casual combination of characters, you will only take part in the battle on the Match 3 battlefield. That is, you will win if you can score more points. The game features three heroines who will oppose you throughout the game.

item.title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
item.description: Game Description Warhammer: Vermintide 2 is a first-person slasher with abilities, magic, character upgrades, a variety of weapons and meat, combining a unique combat system of 5 different factions. The modernized first part is made on a new graphics engine, allowing us to see every severed limb; look at dead enemies and collect dropped loot around them, not paying attention to graphical inaccuracies. The plot of Warhammer: Vermintide 2 revolves around Helmgarth Castle, surrounded by a small settlement.

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance
item.description: Game Description The plot ofKingdom Come: Deliverance takes place in a simple European village. We play as the son of a blacksmith. Our name is Henry. The civil war affected not only the political upheaval, but also ordinary villages and people like yours. Friends, family and your entire lineage have been slaughtered by brutal mercenaries in a sinister plot. We miraculously managed to survive, so we take the last sword forged by our father and march against the army of godless people!

item.title: Rust
item.description: Game Description Rust (Rust) An ideal first-person survival simulator is not a simple escape from a city or civilization, but a necessary measure based on the conditions of our player. In Rust we will have to kill people, animals, build houses, dwellings, try to make fire out of nothing and survive in a world where everything is trying to kill us. The gameplay begins with the fact that we find ourselves on an island.

item.title: Shalnor Legends: Sacred Lands
item.description: Game Description In Shalnor Legends: Sacred Lands, the player follows the trip of the Elf of the Rinna, which goes to the title territory. Its main goal is to complete the complex task created by the goddess Illeria, in order to ultimately become the chosen champion of this deity. The sacred lands obey one special rule: the entrance to this territory is voluntary, but the exit is given only after the complete passage of the test from the goddess.

item.title: Finding Paradise
item.description: Game Description In the pixel questFinding Paradise with an isometric space, there is a corporation - Sigmund Corp. Special agents - Eva Rosalin and Neil Watts - became participants in the realization of the dream of one of the people - Colin Reeds. This man is dying, so our heroes undertake to make his last wishes come true. Arriving at his house, you see how doctors prepare his body and brain, connecting Colin to a special machine that allows you to plunge into his memories and find yourself in an interactive virtual reality.

item.title: Assassin's Creed Origins
item.description: Game Description The story of the third-person slasher is fully explored inAssassin’s Creed Origins. Only in this part we are told and described in detail how the brotherhood of Assassins was actually created, why the entire caste of killers hid for several hundred years, and how the principles of the brotherhood were formed. The plot begins with the fact that we kill one of the pharaohs who own an entire pyramid, hundreds of subjects and countless hired killers.

item.title: Middle-earth: Shadow of War - Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description The action takes place in the fictional world of the writer Tolkien. The Middle Lands are full of adventures for our player, so the plot unfolds from half of them. Events introduce us to the continuation of the previous part. Talion and Celebrimbor forge a new ring, which Sauron does not know about - he will not be able to influence it. The new ring carries with it another responsibility: inMiddle-earth: Shadow of War, Celebrimbor loses his freedom in exchange for a new One Ring.

item.title: Divinity: Original Sin 2 - Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description In this game, elves and other heroes gather in one flock. InDivinity: Original Sin 2 - Definitive Edition even Rivellon has undergone significant changes. The developers completely remade the entire game. No one knows where to start. The graphics in the game became more like realistic ones for some other world. There is nothing superfluous on the screen, and procasts, magical effects and the death of other heroes look better.

item.title: ARK: Survival Evolved
item.description: Game Description The world ofARK: Survival Evolved is a setting full of dangers, in which not only dinosaurs, but also other creatures will try to kill you. People become especially dangerous. The game does not have any interesting plot, but there is a huge open world in which you have to build your base, hunt with a group of people (your friends), attack, defend, make weapons and explore the area. This is a full-fledged survival simulator from the first person (possibly from the 3rd person), where survival is limited to a base with a fire.

item.title: Brigand: Oaxaca
item.description: Game Description Brigand: Oaxaca is a first -person shooter hybrid, immersive simulator and role -playing game. The project has three -dimensional low -polygonal graphics. Due to her, the title resembles computer action of the late 90s and early 2000s. The action takes place in a world where nuclear apocalypse happened. Events unfold on the territory of the Mexican state of Ohak. Indi-game combines elements of different settings. In it, the gunshot weapons are adjacent to Voodoo magic, and not only mutters, but also demons roam the wastelands.

item.title: NieR: Automata
item.description: Game Description An open-world action-adventure game,NieR: Automata tells the story of androids 2B, 9S and A2 as they battle a dystopia created by powerful machines. All of humanity was evicted from their planet by mechanical creatures that arrived from another world. In an attempt to retake the Earth from aliens, people send combat robots to somehow resist the invaders. This must be the final attempt, the last hope to get your home back.

item.title: A magical High School Girl
item.description: Game Description A Magical High School Girl puts a student in a magical dimension, where her only means of protection is the magic that she creates personally. This role -playing game is based on a mechanic that allows the player to come up with the names for his own spells. Based on the words introduced into the interface, the system automatically generates the spontaneous properties and combat effects of the spell.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim Special Edition
item.description: Game Description Skyrim has become one of the favorite games on two continents of our planet. The first/third person slasher captivated players not only with its open-world RPG content, but also with its graphics, sounds, characters, features, and, of course, dragons. Our character inThe Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition begins the same story, but you immediately notice that everything around him is completely different. If in the original version of the game we move along a snowy road, now the colors of the autumn forest prevail, maintaining the same atmosphere.

item.title: Starbound
item.description: Game Description Starbound is a 2D side-scrolling indie RPG adventure with graphics that reference the classic 8-bit titles of the last century. The project has become widespread thanks to the ability to play with a friend in co-op mode on different platforms, as well as a well-developed system of achievements and rewards that motivate you to improve your own skills and collect all kinds of items for crafting and collecting. The surrounding world is presented in the form of open territories, where there are no prohibitions on colonizing unknown planets or performing secondary tasks; you can even not touch the story campaign at all.

item.title: Wayward
item.description: Game Description Survive in the wild in Wayward, traveling around the open world. The protagonist has no basic specialization, as he passes, he pumps skills and becomes capable of everything. To get new characteristics, you have to interact with objects and the world around you. You have the opportunity to play as you want. The world is endless and generated randomly. Objects, chests, opponents, dangers, dungeons and tasks are also created by chance.

item.title: Don't Starve Together
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve Together is a survival simulator in an unknown world, where our character, pre-selected in the editor, wakes up and immediately goes to look for firewood, because Maxwell said so. The game is cooperative, since the story passage is divided into 2 parts. The first is survival. It is built on three phases of the day: day, evening and night. During the day, your character calmly survives, collects items, crafts new ones, eats and carries out orders for Maxwell.

item.title: DARK SOULS 3
item.description: Game Description The gameplay ofDARK SOULS 3 provides all the same opportunities that were in the second part. For us, a third-person slasher with elements of stealth and survival remained at the same level in terms of combat, but the entire combat system was made more dynamic. So much so that sometimes we don’t have time to jump away to recharge our skill, and they already kill us. The real hassle and face of the game genre is difficulty at every turn.

item.title: Stardew Valley
item.description: Game Description Stardew Valley is a sandbox simulator with pixel graphics and multi-platform support, but with a well-thought-out system for earning money and maintaining game balance for the player. The beginning of the game shows how our hero first comes to an abandoned farm, which he received from a deceased relative. Since the protagonist does not mind making money by planting and selling vegetables and fruits, he decides not to sell the farm, but to start equipping it.

item.title: Grim Dawn
item.description: Game Description The gloomy dawn inGrim Dawn showed that the fabric of the created universe was too weak, so Cairn accepted robbers, bandits, magicians and a bunch of all kinds of creatures and undead into its embrace. Dark times have come to the territory of Cairn. But after that, people did not give up trying to attack their enemies, and called aliens into the world. They opened portals for them and let in several individuals to receive ether.

item.title: Dying Light: The Following
item.description: Game Description Dying Light: The Following provides the players with an extensive game world, a large arsenal of weapons, modifications, secondary and plot tasks, as well as dozens of gameplay hours. Visit in the post-apocalyptic world, teeming zombies and other bloodthirsty creatures in the action of the first person. Pour blood in epic battles! Use dozens of ways to kill zombies, as well as interact with surrounding objects that allow the enemies to eliminate opponents.

item.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Our task inRise of the Tomb Raider is to get ahead of your enemies, go on your first expedition and watch interactive videos, of which there are at least 1.5 hours of gameplay in the game. Lara Croft goes to the unknown world of the city of Kitezh. A secret organization called “Trinity” is also heading there. The principle of the game about Lara is an adventure game mixed with the adventure romance of the first journey, in which we kill with a bow, collect important items, and sometimes survive in the wild.

item.title: XCOM 2
item.description: Game Description Twenty years ago, people signed an act of complete surrender of the earth to the aliens. Another civilization has shown that there is no hope for salvation, and therefore alien invaders have taken over the entire planet. At the beginning ofXCOM 2 we are shown a video from the current ruler of the planet (in fact, this is a staged, drawn character, he is controlled by aliens), who says that today is the day when the aliens captured us, and the earth plunged into peace; Today we celebrate 20 years of freedom.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Turn-based strategy with a side view -Darkest Dungeon - developed in a dark style and with rogue-like elements. A huge number of characters will not let you calm down until everyone on the playing field creates the perfect combination for victory. Each battle with opponents is a fascinating tactical adventure, where victory is 80% knowledge of the game and 20% knowledge of logic. Your characters are ordinary people with extraordinary health.

item.title: The Isle
item.description: Game Description The island on whichThe Isle takes place has a rich and varied environment that is randomly generated. All artifacts, items and events will be located in different places with each new launch. Players must team up to effectively explore the area, which contains many secrets, including various quest items that further advance the plot. The map contains an area of ​​16x16 square kilometers. Multiplayer survival game The Isle allows you to play with three different factions in three different modes:

item.title: Just Cause 3
item.description: Game Description Just Cause 3 is a continuation of the famous franchise about the adventures of a specially trained agent named Rico Rodriguez. This part of the series did not deviate from the style and genre of previous games in the universe where the mercenary nicknamed “Scorpio” lives. The end of the trilogy is made with the same driving action, open world, a large number of tricks and devices available in the protagonist’s arsenal, and an adventure plot in which the fate of an entire state will be at stake.

item.title: Fallout 4
item.description: Game Description Fallout 4 is a sequel to the famous role-playing game series in a post-apocalyptic setting. The player wakes up from cryosleep and discovers that he is the only survivor of Vault 111. Having made it to the surface, he finds himself in the Wasteland - a world destroyed by nuclear war. The gameplay includes: a free open world with hundreds of locations to explore, a huge number of NPCs, companions and quests, as well as interaction with many factions, including the Institute, the Brotherhood of Steel, the Minutemen and agents of the Underground; S.

item.title: Undertale
item.description: Game Description In the universe ofUndertale, a role-playing game with pixel graphics, a war broke out between humans and monsters. The people won and locked all the creatures from the other world in an underground wasteland. The underground world of the game tells the story of one boy who finds himself in a closed space with monsters. 7 magicians guarded the dungeon area using barrier spells, but somehow a baby got there, for whom we have to play.

item.title: Way of the Samurai 4
item.description: Game Description Way of the Samurai 4 is a rare world game in the setting of Japan of the nineteenth century. The tie is trivial - the nameless Ronin arrives in the same nameless city and is immediately in the epicenter of local showdowns. The world is a sandbox consisting of city quarters under the control of various groups and a suburbs. The situation in the city is really interesting. Western barbarians came, who were met by local bandits, and the police turned out to be between two lights.

item.title: Barony
item.description: Game Description Barony is a first -person cooperative pung in which it is necessary to go down to dangerous dungeons in order to fight monsters with the help of a sword and magic, to collect treasures and consider death. You will have to die a lot and often. You should be ready for this in advance. Dange is randomly generated and include many secrets that you and your friends have to unravel.

item.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
item.description: Game Description The legendary third-person slasher series -The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, which tells us the story of Geralt of Rivia, who becomes one of the few characters in the central series of action-packed books. We start the game remembering the events of the second part. But let’s not talk about them. Our hero is a born killer, capable of killing and ending the lives of thieves, criminals, assassins, kings, leaders, generals and monsters living throughout the map.

item.title: Exanima
item.description: Game Description Exanima is a representative of the category of isometric role -playing games on a PC, in which the camera is fixed above the character, but it can be brought closer to detailed examination of objects and objects, as well as deleted, for more convenient battles. This project operates the theme of the gloomy Middle Ages, so the arsenal of a character managed by a player consists mainly of long -tier -fingered and remote weapons (bows, crossbows, throwing spears).

item.title: Dark Souls 2: Scholar of the First Sin
item.description: Game Description DARK SOULS 2: Scholar of the First Sin takes the dark atmosphere and addictive gameplay to a whole new level of quality. As before, you, in the role of a wandering soul, have to wander through a dark and mysterious world, use tactics during battle even with simple opponents, and always remain on guard, since danger comes from everywhere - these are the rules of this eerie world.

item.title: Elite Dangerous
item.description: Game Description Elite Dangerous is an online multiplayer game, the third part of the “Elite” franchise, which began in 1984. The player is given complete freedom to explore and travel, and has the opportunity to influence the storyline. The action takes place thousands of years later in the distant future on the territory of several million star galaxies. Most of the stars, planets, asteroids and other cosmic bodies that exist in the real world.

item.title: Dynasty Warriors 8 Empires
item.description: Game Description Alone, fighting thousands of enemies, and using the strategy and tactics of battles, the Dynasty Warriors 8 Empires player will be able to win all ancient China. There is no specific plot, but only scenarios, during which you can play in a certain period of time. In each of the episodes there is a separate distribution of territories, a set of heroes, which is at the start of the battle on the unification of the lands of China.

item.title: Forsaken Isle
item.description: Game Description Forsaken Isle is an adventure survival with a view of the top. You find yourself on a uninhabited island where you have to explore the surrounding territories, collect resources, build refuge and fight with a huge number of enemies. The main thing is to survive at all costs in the hostile environment of the forgotten island. Once alone with nature, you have to use all the skills to survive.

item.title: Dying Light
item.description: Game Description A terrible virus grows into a global problem inDying Light. Starting from the city of Harran in Latin America, the infection is decimating the entire world, turning those infected into the walking dead. The hero must survive in such circumstances and try to correct the situation. As an undercover operative, Kyle Crane receives his most important assignment. He needs to find a guy named Suleiman in order to take away from him an important file that he stole.

item.title: Dungeonmans
item.description: Game Description Dungeonmans The Heroic Adventure Roguelike - a traditional horned in which you explore the dungeons, fight with a variety of monsters and collect lutus. You have to develop your academy in order to open new opportunities and skills. Go to the adventure and take part in step -by -step battles. A fascinating fantasy story awaits you, telling about the confrontation of good and evil. Gameplay Dungeonmans The Heroic Adventure Roguelike:

item.title: The Crew
item.description: Game Description The Crew is a racing match simulator that makes it possible to create its own unique sports car. The plot tells you about the professional racer Alex Taylore. He and his older brother were organizing illegal races. Some time later, the FBI staff found them. Police kill the founder of this event, and the brothers are imprisoned. The heroes are offered to reduce the term, but in return they will have to work in law enforcement agencies.

item.title: Craft the World
item.description: Game Description Craft the World is an adventure 2D game that combines multiple elements. You can explore the procedurally generated worlds, build locks and fortresses, fight with hostile creatures and get materials necessary for numerous crafts. Manage the dwarf tribe and lead them the way you want. The player can send his wards to extract resources, build structures or fight with opponents. But, not everything is so simple. You have to put them on, help in battles and feed them in time.

item.title: Gems of War - Puzzle RPG
item.description: Game Description Gems of War - Puzzle RPG is a mixture of role -playing game and casual puzzle in the spirit of “three in a row” with KKI elements. Title came to a PC from mobile devices. The project has a single and multiplayer content. There is a PVP with a rating system, online tournaments, contractions with mobs, weekly events, quests, guilds, events for several players, mini-games, a story campaign where history is given through dialogue inserts.

item.title: Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor
item.description: Game Description The main character -Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor - will fight Sauron and avenge his family. One day, Sauron kidnapped Talion to sacrifice him and summon Celebrimbor, the spirit of the main elf in the world of the Lord of the Rings. However, this spirit helps Talion to resurrect, gives him new abilities and sends him into battle. The protagonist’s enemies are Sauron and his dark lords: the Hammer, the Black Hand and the Tower.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls Online
item.description: Game Description The gameThe Elder Scrolls Online offers you to go through a number of locations for several warring factions, playing both alone and in real time with other players. The plot tells how Molag Bal, known as the Prince of Violence, decides to take over the entire kingdom of Tamriel and enslave ordinary citizens. The gamer will have to face the forces of evil and defeat him. Throughout the game world of The Elder Scrolls Online, there are several factions available, each of which is endowed with certain properties.

item.title: South Park: The Stick of Truth (game)
item.description: Game Description The funny events of South Park take us into the world of the gameSouth Park: The Stick of Truth, where we play the role of a newcomer who has ambitions and a desire to build a circle of friends in a new city. As soon as we enter the game, famous fourth graders start swinging swords and casting random spells. One of these brings chaos and evil into this world, which we have to cope with.

item.title: Kingdom Rush
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Rush is a project in the “tower defense” genre, in the style of the Middle Ages, interspersed with magic, creatures that do not exist in real life, like trolls, and real-time control of heroes with a choice of the direction and course of their attacks. This game received recognition on many platforms and later reached personal computers. The gameplay is standard for the genre, the advantage over other projects is the refined balance and exciting, moderately difficult levels that challenge and force you to change battle tactics and constantly be on the alert.

item.title: Project Zomboid
item.description: Game Description Project Zomboid is a cross-platform game in which we will have to find a house, equip it, and start surviving in a world where a zombie apocalypse has recently occurred. We are located in Knox County. The latest epidemic infected more than 90% of the district’s residents, and they all became zombies. Difficult conditions will force us to survive, stock up on food, water, weapons and all available supplies in order to simply survive.

item.title: BioShock Infinite
item.description: Game Description BioShock Infinite is a first-person shooter with multiple mechanics of a role-playing adventure in the style of science fiction and steampunk. The game will take place in 1912 in an alternative universe, in the flying city of the United States of America - Columbia. You need to control the private detective Booker Devitt, who has a task to find a cute girl named Elizabeth. Immediately after it is found, the main characters find themselves in the very epicenter of the war.

item.title: Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Tomb Raider is a restart of the series telling about the adventures of Lara Croft. The ship on which the girl’s crew was sailing was wrecked. On the island she is captured and left tied in a cave. The adventurer frees herself from her bonds and goes to look for the crew members. The player can choose the difficulty, which affects the course of battles. A vast world opens up before the gamer, divided into several locations.

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter -Far Cry 3 - will teach you how to survive in the wild conditions of the open world, more or less value relationships with good people, and show you what real madness is. The series rewarded us with enough action, showing that a huge arsenal of weapons is just part of what can be given to players in return for their desire to enjoy a completely open world and a good story.

item.title: Castle Crashers
item.description: Game Description Castle Crashers is an arcade action game in which players will take control of powerful characters and fight monsters. Create a squad by choosing from 25 characters to fight your way through castles against your enemies. Compete with other users or monsters living throughout the continent. The plot will unfold at a ball in the king’s castle. During the fun, an evil sorcerer stole a precious magic stone and four princesses, who must be rescued by the knights and fight the enemy.

item.title: Borderlands 2
item.description: Game Description Borderlands 2 is a shooter with a view from the perspective of the protagonist and leveling up abilities and passive improvements, as in the role-playing adventure genre. A direct continuation of the story of the original game. The main differences from the first part are a greater emphasis on the plot component and the addition of a more advanced weapon editor with many possible modifications that open up as you progress.

item.title: Saints Row: The Third
item.description: Game Description The Third Street Saints are a large and large group in the universe of the gameSaints Row: The Third. The third-person shooter with its crazy plots gave the game’s heroes their own brand of sneakers, a carbonated drink and a logo, and now they have to fight the world’s largest crime syndicate, whose people are scattered around the world and do their work in the “shadows”. Since the main characters have long captured Stillwater, the Syndicate demands offerings from them in the form of tribute for the criminal leadership.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim
item.description: Game Description The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim is rightfully considered a legendary game. Even now, many years after its release, it continues to conquer new users who come to it based on recommendations or out of their own interest. In the role of a warrior named Dovahkiin, the gamer will find himself in a huge world full of mysteries, unexpected turns and battles. Here it is not possible to follow the path of a straightforward passage.

item.title: To the Moon
item.description: Game Description To the Moon is a philosophical story about two doctors - Eva Rosalina and Neil Watts from the Sigmund organization. The heroes make a tragic journey through the memories of a dying man. In this way they are trying to fulfill his last will, the essence of which is to let the person live his life again. The dying person remembers the new life that he sees at death before leaving this world.

item.title: Terraria
item.description: Game Description Terraria is a simulator of construction, life, survival, an interesting storyline and everything that could be combined into a game with the Sand Box style. Simple 8-bit graphics take us into a randomly generated world generated by the game itself. The open map is almost endless if you dig deep into the world, but you will be stopped by armies of monsters or underground knights. Terraria is not as simple as it seems.

item.title: The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings
item.description: Game Description The computer game “The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings” is an expanded limited edition of the impressive continuation of the 2008 giant of the world of role-playing video games “The Witcher”. The development of this project was carried out by the famous studio CD PROJEKT RED. The announcement came in May 2011. Geralt of Rivia is the greatest of the line of witchers, wielding a sword better than others, almost the only one who can resist the forces of darkness, while being something between an ordinary person and a monster.

item.title: Mount and Blade: Warband
item.description: Game Description Mount & Blade: Warband is a standalone add-on that brings many improvements and innovations to the game. New textures, object and character models, as well as sophisticated visualization settings. Change FSAA anti-aliasing, tone mapping and other effects in the settings. Modernized animations, improved combat system and the spirit of the heroes. People will flee if they are in imminent danger or, conversely, fight to the last if their morality is high.

item.title: Blades of Fire
item.description: Game Description Blades of Fire offers to gamers to take on the role of Aran de Lira, who begins his way to find a true purpose. The Queen of Nereya turned steel into stone throughout the kingdom with her witchcraft. Only her army, consisting of abominations and undead, has a divine metal that can effectively resist any other armament. This mission leads Aran and his ADSO companion through the vast world, filled with dangers, deep secrets and various locations, such as huge castles and labyrinths of palaces.

item.title: Dreamed Away
item.description: Game Description Dreamed Away causes a feeling of foggy nostalgia, a journey along the path of memories that takes an unexpected turn. The bizarre charm of the France of the 1990s collapses around the edges, opening the world at the same time alarming and strangely alluring. Theo, our main character, is drawn into this fairy -tale world. K conmitted bridges turn into impossible figures, familiar houses turn into grotesque carications on themselves.

item.title: Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era
item.description: Game Description Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era returns to the world of Enrot, inviting both veterans and new gamers to the strategic campaign on the continent of Jadam. This prequel returns to the origins of the determining genre and the recognition of critics of a series of step -by -step strategic games. Here, the rival factions should unite against the hive - the swarm of the insectoids, led by the master of the demons of Inferno.

item.title: Legends of Astravia
item.description: Game Description Legends of Astravia Transes users to a world filled with magic - a world where Oliver, mystic with amnesia occupies the central place. This is a tribute to retro-role-playing games, invites to explore the mystical kingdom of Astravia. The solution to ancient secrets and battles with formidable enemies are only part of the adventure. Traveling around the vast world, reminiscent of the classic Zelda dungeons, gamers will find hidden corners and nooks, which are asked to be opened.

item.title: Mother Hub
item.description: Game Description Mother Hub - this is not a typical shooter. This game throws you headlong into a hopeless situation - humanity on the edge of the abyss, and only you keep the reins of government. Each of your solution, each path you have chosen can become the difference between survival and oblivion. Fasten, because here the choice has consequences. Here it is not just that you need to press the trigger.

item.title: Ribby: The Game
item.description: Game Description Ribby: The Game - this is not a typical role -playing adventure. Forget about the extermination of dragons or collecting a million gold coins. Here is the hero - Ribbie, a kind girl, who has lost and seeking the house. Title combines elements of role -playing games and visual novels, creating a unique experience. Of course, the main goal is to return Ribbie home, but this is only the top of Lilia.

item.title: Solitaire Battle
item.description: Game Description Solitaire Battle combines the mechanics of the card game with the progression of the Autobatler’s Horned. Players are faced with opponents where key interaction is a party in the solitaire of three peaks. Each card taken from the field or from the deck is converted into an offensive or defensive action, creating automated combat sequences. The main task is to strategically disassemble the layout to win enemies, while forming a set of random pool of tools that contribute to powerful synergies and encouraging new combinations in each passage.

item.title: VED
item.description: Game Description VED is an action role-playing game focused on story and turn-based combat. The gameplay contains roguelike elements. The game involves exploring a mysterious island full of monsters and dangerous creatures. In the world of the game, the magic of witches operates - powerful creatures with forbidden knowledge. The protagonist of the game is a hero named Cyrus. He comes to Micropolis with the hope of finding a new life.

item.title: Zenless Zone Zero
item.description: Game Description Zenless Zone Zero is a role -playing game whose action takes place in a world standing on the edge of the abyss, where players take on the role of proxy, a conductor according to alternative dimensions, known as hollows. Players choose one of the two main characters, the wise or Belle, each of which leads the expedition to these dangerous areas. Target? Fight with creatures called Eterials, and go through various tests in these dimensions.

item.title: HAVEN: Secret of Caledria
item.description: Game Description The game process Haven: Secret of Caledria is inspired by the classic JRPG of the 90s. All the key features of the gameplay are observed: a journey through a large open world in the company of partners, the implementation of numerous quests, a study of the dungeons and step -by -step battles. It will take about 20 hours of real time to pass the main storyline. Hample Haven: Secret of Caledria is inspired by such cult projects as Lufia, Breath of Fire, Suikoden and Chrono Trigger.

item.title: Beastieball
item.description: Game Description Beastieball unites two seemingly unrelated genre - taming monsters and sport - into a single holistic experience. In this game, users take on the role of a coach who is not like a coach or manager, directing the team of animals through various biomes in order to gain, train and ultimately take part in a step -by -step volleyball league. Paying special attention to strategies, research and teamwork, Advencura is a new look both at the monsters gathering genre and the world of sports.

item.title: Dustland Delivery
item.description: Game Description Dustland Delivery puts users in the post -apocalyptic world, where they have to build an empire of delivery. The center of the game is profit, survival and strategic decisions. Gamers start with a truck and gain a team, each of which has unique skills. The purpose of the game? Build cities by successful delivery of goods, competing with rivals and overcoming dangers. The world is inexorable. Users move in an insidious area, control resources and make a critical choice.

item.title: Genshin Impact
item.description: Game Description Genshin Impact is an alloy of action and role -playing play from a third -person view. The Chinese project using anime style has an open world. Title is primarily designed for solitary passage, although it has the opportunity to run in a cooperative. There is no PVP mode in a local multiplayer. At the very beginning of the game, they allow you to choose the main character - brother or sister.

item.title: Good Heavens!
item.description: Game Description Good HEAVENS! It takes place in the Severe Kingdom of Xant-Rar, a bizarre afterlife, where souls live on floating islands. This songwriter with the open world allows gamers to pave their own path in the world, crowded with bizarre capabilities. Imagine: you have lived a good life, have left the earthly path and got into Xant -Rar - a place intended for the fulfillment of all your desires throughout eternity.

item.title: Ifsunsets
item.description: Game Description IFSUnsets is an adventure role -playing adventure for survival in which gamers fall into a complex situation. The game begins with the fact that users find themselves on the island after a shipwreck. This initial scenario lays the basis for research and survival. During the day, users can collect supplies and resources scattered across the island. This stage of collecting resources is very important for preparing for dangers that are hidden after sunset.

item.title: Nihongo Quest
item.description: Game Description The fantasy world in** nihongo quest** shows the Gakush universe, where users will be able to create and customize their character to go on adventure. The game is made in the form of Japanese role adventura, where you have to move on a pixel isometric map with a view of the top. Players will participate in step -by -step battles with opponents, pump a hero and face a variety of puzzles, which are based on the creation of more than 1000 words and hieroglyphs.

item.title: OneShot
item.description: Game Description OneShot is an adventure puzzle game with Metroidvania elements. As Niko, you interact with both the character and the world. The gameplay invites you to go through an inventive quest in which you need to find a variety of objects, combining them with each other and using them on the environment, which will allow you to advance through the plot. Stylistically, OneShot is a 2D game from a top-down perspective.

item.title: Operator
item.description: Game Description Operator is an exciting game where you become a secret operative performing dangerous tasks around the world. A realistic experience of tactical battle awaits you, where your every decision matters. The game contains a unique system of physical interaction, which allows you to manipulate objects and weapons naturally. This adds a feeling of presence and realism, without the need to use VR-Schles. A special emphasis in the operator is placed on a multi -user cooperative regime.

item.title: Shape of Dream
item.description: Game Description Shape of Dream A project whose essence is this: Imagine an action Rogue-Lite, seasoned with Moba elements, invented by Lizard Smoothie for PC roamers. Are you intrigued? Still. This world of dreams is your playground. You are sculpting the heroes from their memories, turning them into champions, like a sculptor from a cutter. Alone or with three friends in a cooperative, Adventure destroys the boundaries of the genre, offering something fresh.

item.title: Shattehed Pixel Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Shattehed Pixel Dungeon is an adventure in gloomy dungeons where users will take on the role of an adventurer. The setting is made in the style of dark fantasy, where you have to face various monsters. The game was made in the genre of Rolewal Rowlian Adventure, showing the journey of 4 characters. Levels in a single campaign are made in a randomized form, filling each time randomly locations with opponents and rooms in which the protagonist will be able to get.

item.title: Soul Apocalypto
item.description: Game Description Soul Apocalypto is a role -playing game that includes systems of several strategic sucks. The gameplay combines team battles with the collecting of creatures and some mechanics of collecting decks, with a view of both from above and from a third party. The main lesson is the call of various companions for creating a personalized combat detachment. Progress directly depends on the choice of these fighters and their layout in a group that can explore the open world.

item.title: Soulmask
item.description: Game Description Soulmask is a mystical twist on the survival genre. Gamers eschew the usual “rags” and instead awaken clutching an ancient mask after a near-death experience. This relic is more than just a creepy wall decoration, it’s a game changer. Angry weather and wild animals won’t be your only problem. Soulmask features a vast open world that you must navigate in order to survive. Gathering resources is a must, but you can’t do it alone.

item.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate
item.description: Game Description Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate immerses players in a Roguelike adventure, in the center of which are your favorite ninja turtles. Here, gamers take on the roles of Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael, each of which is endowed with certain abilities. The narrative begins with the abduction of their mentor, Splinter, an evil Shredder. This laid the foundation for the study of various areas of New York, full of difficulties and enemies hiding behind each angle.
